column2: Duration of [Daino] increases by 40 seconds per attribute level.
column3: Efek durasi skill [Daino] meningkat per attribute level 40 detik.

column2: Increases splash from [Hexing] by 1 per level.
column3: Meningkatkan splash dari [Hexing] sebanyak 1 per level.

column2: Enemies attacked with [Effigy] fall under [Blind] state at a 5% chance per Attribute level.
column3: Musuh yang diserang menggunakan [Effigy] akan terkena [Blind] dengan 5% kemungkinan per Attribute level.

column2: Strength of enemies within [Ogouveve] decreases by 2 per attribute level.
column3: Strength dari musuh dengan [Ogouveve] berkurang 2 per attribute level.

column2: Chance of new zombie appearing increase by 2% per attribute level when using [Damballa].
column3: Kemungkinan memunculkan Zombie Baru meningkat 2% per attribute level ketika menggunakan [Damballa].

column2: Physical defense of zombies in [Bwa Kayiman] increases by 3 per Attribute level.
column3: Physical defense dari Zombie dalam [Bwa Kayiman] meningkat sebanyak 3 per Attribute level.

column3: Mengurangi akumulasi damage sebanyak 10% per attribute level ketika [Mackangdal] aktif.

column2: Max. number of zombies in [Zombify] increases by 1 per Attribute level.
column3: Jumlah zombies di [Zombify] meningkat sebanyak 1 per Attribute level.

column2: Chance of acquiring materials through [Carve] increases by 5% per attribute level.
column3: Kemungkinan mendapatkan material menggunakan [Carve] meningkat 5% per attribute level.

column2: [Carve] deals 5% additional damage per attribute level to plant-type monsters.
column3: [Carve] memberikan 5% damage tambahan per attribute level untuk monster type plant.

column2: Increases the numbers [Carve Owl] can maintain by 1 per attribute level.
column3: Meningkatkan jumlah yang dapat dikontrol [Carve Owl] 1 per attribute level.

column3: Musuh yang terkena serangan [Carve Owl] memiliki kemungkinan 5% per attribute level untuk terkena [Flame] menerima 5% magic damage kamu sebagai damage selama 5 detik.

column2: Pulls enemies within range of [Carve World Tree].
column3: Menarik musuh dengan jarak [Caraver World Tree].

column2: [Blunt object] do 10% extra damage per attribute level to plant type monsters.
column3: [Blunt object] memberikan 10% extra damage per attribute level untuk plant type monsters.

column2: Increases the duration of [Statue of Goddess Zemyna] by 2 seconds per attribute level.
column3: Meningkatkan durasi dari [Statue of Goddess Zemyna] sebanyak 2 detik per attribute level.

column2: While the [Astral Projection] is enabled, evasion of body increases by 10% per attribute level.
column3: Ketika dalam kondisi [Astral Projection] berlangsung, kemampuan menghindar meningkat 10% per attribute level.

column2: Enemies hit with [Astral Body Explosion] are knocked down.
column3: Musuh yang diserang menggunakan [Astral Body Explosion] akan dijatuhkan.

column2: Recovers 5% of max. HP per attribute level when using [Prakriti].
column3: Memulihkan 5% of max. HP per attribute level ketika menggunakan [Prakriti].

column2: Out of Body Basic Attack: Enemy Defense Weakened
column3: Out of Body Basic Attack: Enemy Defense Weakened

column3: Musuh yang diserang dengan serangan normal dalam spirit state akan terkena [Defense Weakening] sebanyak 5% chance per attribute level.

column2: Fire, Ice, and Lightning resistances increase by 5 and Poison, Earth resistance decreases by 5 per attribute level when using [Resists Elements]
column3: Kekebalan Fire, Ice, and Lightning meningkat 5 and Poison, Kekebalan Earth turun sebanyak 5 per attribute level ketika menggunakan [Resists Elements]

column3: Musuh yang diserang menggunakanl [Barrier] menerima 20% Magic attack per attribute level sebagai Holy damage.

column3: kemungkinan Instant death dari skill [Turn Undead] sekarang juga mempengaruhi spirit kamu.

column3: Strength dari musuh mengkonversi dengan [Conversion] meningkat 10%.

column3: [Two-handed Bow] memberikan 20% damage tambahan ke Flying type monsters.

column3: Memulihkan attribute sebanyak Lv x 5% SP ketika Multi-Shot is critical.

column3: Ketika skill [Swift Step] aktif, tingkat critical meningkat 10% per attribute level.

column3: Musuh yang diserang dengan [Barrage] akan didorong menjauh dengan kemungkinan 10% per attribute level.

column2: You can change directions while charging [High Anchoring].
column3: Kamu dapat mengubah arah ketika You can change directions while mengisi [High Anchoring].

column2: Enemy attacked with [Bounce shot] are inflicted with [Slow] at a 3% chance per attribute level.
column3: Musuh yang dipukul dengan [Bounce shot] akan terkena [Slow] dengan 3% kemungkinan per attribute level.

column2: Attack speed lost while under[Steady Aim] decreases 5% per attribute level.

column3: Meningkatkan jumlah dari Pavises yang dapat ditanam hingga 2, tapi HP dari Pavise akan berkurang setengah.

column3: Musuh akan terkena [Bleed] dengan kemungkinan 8%  per attribute level ketika menginjak caltrops.

column2: Increases the chance of stun from [Stone Shot] by 5% per level.
column3: Meningkatkan kemungkinan stun dari [Stone Shot] sebanyak 5% per level.

column2: You can change directions while charging [Rapid Fire] (Not possible when shooting)
column3: Kamu dapat mengubah arah ketika mengisi [Rapid Fire] (Tidak dapat digunakan ketika menembak)

column2: Fixes the number of stone bullets picked by [Stone Picking] to be [skill level].
column3: Jumlah Stone Bullet yang dapat diambil dari [Stone Picking] sesuai dengan [skill level].

column3: Watu rotasi dari [Broom Trap] berkurang 0.2 detik per attribute level dan jumlah dari waktu durasi berkurang 1 per attribute level.

column2: Number of enemies hit by [Claymore] increases by 1 per Attribute level.
column3: Jumlah musuh yang diserang menggunakan [Claymore] meningkat 1 per Attribute level.

column2: Enemies blown away with [Punji Steak] receive fall damage equal to 50% of character's Physical attack.
column3: Musuh yang dihembus degan [Punji Steak] menerima damage jatuh sama dengan 50% dari karakter Physical attack.

column2: Increases the number of magic circles that can be detonated with [Detonate Traps] by 1 per attribute level.
column3: Meningkatkan jumlah dari Lingkaran Magic yang dapat meledak dari [Detonate Traps] sebanyak 1 per attribute level.

column2: Monster affected by [Pointing] are inflicted with [fear] with a 10% chance per attribute level.

column2: Enemies bitten with [Coursing] attack the companion.
column3: Musuh yang digigit dengan [Coursing] attack dari companion.

column2: Defense of enemies attacked with [Retrieve] decreases by 5 per attribute level.

column2: Enemy found using [Hounding] is inflicted wtih [Confusion] with a 10% chance per attribute level.

column2: Synthesize two weapons to change the basic options. The outcome may be better or worse. Weapon used as material becomes destroyed.
column3: Sintestis dua senjata kembali menjadi option dasar. Hasil yang didapat bisa lebih baik ataupun kurang. Senjata yang digunakan sebagai material akan hancur.

column3: Kemungkinan kritikal akan meningkat ketika serang dari belakang.

column2: Use [Thrust] on stunned enemies for additional Bleed effect.
column3: Menggunakan [Thrust] pada musuh yang terkena stun akan memberikan efek Bleed.

column2: Enemies blocked by [Cross Guard] temporarily become vulnerable to stab attacks.
column3: Musuh yang terblock dari [Cross Guard] sementara akan menjadi lemah untuk diberikan serangan Stab.

column2: Using Fire property attacks to finish enemies will cause an explosion and splash damage.
column3: Menggunakan attack berelemen Fire untuk membunuh musuh akan menyebabkan efek ledakan dan damage sekitar.

column2: Using Ice Property attacks to finish enemies will slow down nearby enemies.
column3: Menggunakan attack berelemen Ice untuk membunuh musuh akan melambatkan musuh sekitar.

column2: Using sword attacks on enemies with [Depreotected Zone] decreases defense.
column3: Menggunakan Sword Attack pada musuh di [Depreotected Zone] akan mengurangi Defense.

column2: {#DD5500}{ol}[Physical] - [Strike]{/}{/}{nl}Use sword handle to smack enemy.{nl}Attack stunned enemies for additional damage. Damage ignore bonus applies to small and medium sized monsters.
column3: {#DD5500}{ol}[Physical] - [Strike]{/}{/}{nl}Menggunakan Pedang yang dipegang untuk memukul musuh.{nl}Attack musuh yang terkena stun akan mendapatkan damage tambahan. Mengabaikan Damage Bonus yang diberikan ke monster ukuran small dan medium.
Attack Power #{SkillAtkAdd}#{nl}Mengabaikan Defense pada Target kecil dan sedang #{CaptionRatio}#{nl}Splash #{SkillSR}#

column2: {#DD5500}{ol}[Physical] - [Slash]{/}{/}{nl}Perform a side slash on enemies.{nl}Enemies afflicted with [Bleeding] take additional damage.
column3: {#DD5500}{ol}[Physical] - [Slash]{/}{/}{nl}Memberikan tebasan di sekitar musuh.{nl}Musuh yang terkena status [Bleeding] akan menerima damage tambahan.

column2: {#DD5500}{ol}[Physical] - [Strike]{/}{/}{nl}Throw shield to attack. Shield falls on the ground and must be picked up to reuse.
column3: {#DD5500}{ol}[Physical] - [Strike]{/}{/}{nl}Melempar Shield untuk menyerang. Shield yang jatuh ke tanah harus diambil kembali untuk digunakan.

column2: Change to stance using Shield. Block and Critiacal resistance increase but basic attack decreases.
column3: Mengganti Stance dengan Shield. Block and Kekebalan Critical meningkat tetapi Attack berkurang.

column2: {#DD5500}{ol}[Physical] - [Strike] - [Slash]{/}{/}{nl}Use the edge of your shield to attack and slash enemies.
column3: {#DD5500}{ol}[Physical] - [Strike] - [Slash]{/}{/}{nl}Menggunakan sisi shield untuk menyerang dan menebas musuh.

column2: {#DD5500}{ol}[Physical] - [Strike]{/}{/}{nl}Use the back of a knife to strike and push away enemies. The enemy becomes afflicted with Armor Break (Permanent on monsters)
column3: {#DD5500}{ol}[Physical] - [Strike]{/}{/}{nl}Menggunakan bagian belakang pisau untuk menyerang dan mendorong musuh. Musuh akan terkena efek Armor Break (Permanent on monsters)

column2: {#DD5500}{ol}[Physical] - [Pierce]{/}{/}{nl}Pierces enemies.{nl}A continuous attack bonus is applied depending on the enemy's size.
column3: {#DD5500}{ol}[Physical] - [Pierce]{/}{/}{nl}Menembus musuh.{nl}Attack Bonus berulang akan diberikan sesuai dengan ukuran musuh.

column2: {#DD5500}{ol}[Physical] - [Pierce]{/}{/}{nl}Inflict damage on enemies by throwing your spear. The thrown spear on the ground can be re-used by picking it up.
column3: {#DD5500}{ol}[Physical] - [Pierce]{/}{/}{nl}Melempar tombok untuk menyerang musuh. Tombak yang jatuh ketanah harus diambil kembali untuk digunakan.

column2: {#DD5500}{ol}[Physical] - [Strike]{/}{/}{nl}Gather force and smash the ground with your weapon to attack the target.
column3: {#DD5500}{ol}[Physical] - [Strike]{/}{/}{nl}Mengumpulkan Force dan memukul ke tanah dengan Senjata pada target.

column2: {#DD5500}{ol}[Physical] - [Slash]{/}{/}{nl}Swing your spear overhead to continuously attack enemies in front of you.
column3: {#DD5500}{ol}[Physical] - [Slash]{/}{/}{nl}Mengayunkan Tombak melewati Kepala dan melakukan damage berulang pada musuh di depan.

column2: Attack: #{SkillAtkAdd}#{nl}Maximum Duration: 10 seconds{nl}Splash: #{SkillSR}#{nl}Able to use while riding
column3: Attack Power #{SkillAtkAdd}#{nl}Max. Durasi 10 detik{nl}Splash #{SkillSR}#{nl}Dapat digunakan ketika riding

column2: {#DD5500}{ol}[Physical] - [Strike]{/}{/}{nl}Tie enemy with rope and drag it.{nl}Enemy received damage every time it is pulled and falls under Bleed state when released.
column3: {#DD5500}{ol}[Physical] - [Strike]{/}{/}{nl}Mengikat musuh dengan tali dan menariknya.{nl}Musuh menerima damage setiap waktu ketika ditarik dan terkena efek Blind serta Bleed ketika terlepas.

column2: {#DD5500}{ol}[Physical] - [Pierce]{/}{/}{nl}Release a powerful stab into an enemy, then kick it away with your foot.
column3: {#DD5500}{ol}[Physical] - [Pierce]{/}{/}{nl}Melepaskan Serangan yang kuat ke musuh lalu menendangnya menggunakan kakimu.

column2: {#DD5500}{ol}[Physical] - [Strike]{/}{/}{nl}Make solid landing when jumping or on air to damage enemies.
column3: {#DD5500}{ol}[Physical] - [Strike]{/}{/}{nl}Membuat Solid Landing ketika Lompat atau terlempar keudara dan memberikan damage ke musuh.

column2: Open shop for repairing weapons. ATK is added when repaired.
column3: Membuka toko untuk memperbaiki senjata. ATK ditambahkan ketika diperbaiki.

column2: Increases attack equal to [Skill Level][Number of Weapon Stars]{nl}Attack Count: #{CaptionRatio2}#{nl}Duration: 4 hour
column3: Attack bertambah sama dengan [Skill Level][Number of Weapon Stars]{nl}Attack Count: #{CaptionRatio2}#{nl}Durasi: 4 Jam

column2: Open shop for repairing armors. Only top, pants, and shield can be repaired. Physical defense is added when repaired.
column3: Membuka toko untuk memperbaiki Armor. Hanya top, pants, dan shield yang dapat diperbaiki. Physical defense akan ditambahkan ketika diperbaiki.

column2: Open shop to repair equipments. Item can be repaired beyond max. durability.
column3: Membuka Toko untuk memperbaiki Equip. Item akan diperbaiki dengan beyond max. durabiliti.

column2: You're holding the enemy tied on rope. You can also hold the boss monsters.
column3: Kamu akan memegang musuh dengan ikatan tali. Kamu dapat menahan Boss Monster.

column2: Set up a base camp in a field. Party members can use the base camp for personal storage and can freely warp to it.
column3: Membangun basecamp di field. Anggota Party dapat meminta Basecamp untuk storage pribadi dan dapat secara gratis teleport ke basecamp.

column2: Set up a refreshment table where you can share food with party members. It can be set up nearby a base camp and it will disbanded when the base camp is disbanded.
column3: Membangun Distribusi Meja Makanan dimana kamu dapat berbagi dengan Anggota Party. Ini dapat dibangun dekat Basecamp dan akan menghancurkan Basecamp tersebut.

column2: Increases the food effectivenes by skill level
column3: Meningkatkan efektivitas food dengan skill level

column2: Stick flag that boosts the combat abilities of the pirates on the ground. Kill enemies continuously for fever combo.
column3: Bendera akan memberikan efek tambahan terhadap combat abiliti Pirate di area. Membunuh musuh akan mendapatkan Fever Combo secara berulang.

column2: {#DD5500}{ol}[Physical] - [Strike]{/}{/}{nl}Use Iron Hook to drag enemy. Enemy receives damage every time it is pulled.
column3: {#DD5500}{ol}[Physical] - [Strike]{/}{/}{nl}Menggunakan Iron Hook untuk menarik musuh. Musuh akan menerima damage setiap waktu ketika ditarik.

column2: Able to open treasure chests below Lv #{CaptionRatio}#
Temporarily connects your basic attacks and dagger attacks.
column3: Sementara menghubungkan basic attack dan dagger attack.

column2: Able to use the dagger without delay from the basic attack
column3: Dapat menggunakan sword kanan setelah basic attack

column2: Change to Phalanx formation. All blocks of troops are concentrated to the front three troops.
column3: Mengubah menjadi Formasi Phalanx. Semua Block dari Pasukan akan terkonsentrasi terhadap tiga pasukan terdepan.

column2: Block increases for troop in front{nl}Rest of troops : 0 block
column3: Block meningkat untuk Pasukan di depan{nl}Sisa Pasukan : 0 block

column2: Change to Tersio formation. Defense of troops in the front row increase and call enemy's attention.
column3: Mengubah menjadi Formasi Tersio. Defense dari pasukan di baris depan akan meningkat  dan dapat menarik perhatian musuh.

column2: Change to Winged formation. Defense of enemies in front is decreased.
column3: Berubah menjadi Formasi Winged. Defense musuh didepan akan berkurang.

column2: Change to Wedge formation. Attack of the troop in front applies as continuos attack.
column3: Berubah menjadi Formasi Wedge. Attack dari pasukan didepan akan menghasilkan damage berulang.

column2: Change to Schiltron formation. All troops hold their weapons up high and enemies are blown away.
column3: Berubah menjadi Formasi Schiltron. Semua pasukan akan menahan Senjatanya keatas dan musuh akan dihempaskan and enemies are blown away.

column2: Enemy approaching is pushed far back
column3: Musuh yang mendekat akan didorong jauh kebelakang

column2: Change to Testudo formation. All troops move in a defense stance with their shields up front.
column3: Berubah menjadi Formasi Testudo. Semua pasukan akan bergerak menjadi defense stance dengan Shield didepan.

column2: Attack - #{CaptionRatio}#%{nl}Defense increase as much as increased attack
column3: Attack - #{CaptionRatio}#%{nl}Defense meningkat sesuai dengan damage yang bertambah

column2: The direction you face become front
column3: Arah kamu akan menjadi di depan

column2: When taking damage, your attack speed and attack are increased, but your defense is decreased.
column3: Ketika menerima damage, kecepatan serangan dan attack akan bertambah, tapi defense kamu akan berkurang.

column2: Temporarily grants a high resistance to being affected by knock back, knock down or staggered.
column3: Memberikan kekebalan yang tinggi sementara waktu terhadap knock back, knock down, atau staggered

column2: {#DD5500}{ol}[Physical] - [Strike]{/}{/}{nl}Use back of sword to smack down enemy.
Kill the enemy within set attack counts for additional EXP and rewards. But damage and Incapable of combate penalty also increases while the effects last.
column3: Membunuh musuh dengan set jumlah serangan akan mendapatkan tambahan EXP dan hadiah. Tetapi damage dan juga Combat penalti meningkatkan ketika efek berlangsung.
{#DD5500}{ol}[Physical] - [Slash]{/}{/}{nl}Secara cepat berubah damage ke sekitar musuh.

column2: Grow target's right hand and increase defense.
column3: Menumbuhkan Tangan kanan pada target dan meningkatkan Defense.

column2: Grow target's head and increase INT.
column3: Menumbuhkan Kepala pada target dan meningkatkan INT.

column2: Let it rain in a targeted area. The rain provides various effects.
column3: Mengeluarkan hujan pada terget area. Hujan memberikan bermacam-macam efek.

column2: Summon demon type boss {nl}registered to Grimore
column3: Summon demon type boss {nl}registered to Grimore

column2: Order devils to move and attack.
column3: Mengontrol Devils untuk menyerang dan bergerak.

column2: Rode on top of Grimore Demon.
Enables you to use a Devil's skill
Mutate Grimore Demon to the demon registered as sub.
column3: Mutasi Grimore Demon untuk terdaftar sebagai Sub.

column2: Transform to another Devil-type boss that is added to the Grimoire
column3: Merubah Boss Demon lainnya untuk ditambahkan menjadi Grimoire

column2: {#993399}{ol}[Magic] - [Dark]{/}{/}{nl}Summons Familiar spirits that approaches enemy and explode.
column3: {#993399}{ol}[Magic] - [Dark]{/}{/}{nl}Summons Familiar spirits yang dapat mendekati musuh dan meledak.

column2: Summon Salamion. Salamion attacks enemies it sees.
column3: Summon Salamion. Salamion menyerang musuh yang dilihatnya.

column2: Give monster the effect of reviving after killed.
column3: Memberikan monster untuk hidup kembali ketika dibunuh.

column2: Temporarily stop time in specified area. Target does not receive any damage while time is stopped.
column3: Sementara menghentikan waktu pada daerah tertentu. Target tidak akan menerima damage apapun ketika waktu dihentikan.

column2: Movement speed - #{CaptionRatio}#%{nl}Magic circle duration #{CaptionRatio2}# seconds{nl}{#339999}{ol}[Slow]{/}{/} duration 5 seconds
column3: Kecepatan bergerak - #{CaptionRatio}#%{nl}Durasi Lingkaran Magic #{CaptionRatio2}# detik{nl}{#339999}{ol}[Slow]{/}{/} duration 5 detik

column2: Turn back all times within the area to time before skill was used.
column3: Kembali ke area waktu dimana sebelum skill digunakan.

column2: Backmasking range 100{nl}Cannot use backmasking in the area for 10 seconds
column3: Backmasking Range 100{nl}Tidak dapat menggunakan Backmasking di area selama 10 detik

column2: {#993399}{ol}[Magic]{/}{/}{nl}Collect corpse parts when monsters are killed using this attack.

column2: Create a formation that calls on the squads members.
Change to the Phalanx formation. All of the squad members' block will be focused to the 3 in the front row.
column3: Berubah menjadi Formasi Phalanx. Konsentrasi untuk menahan skill dari semua pasukan di depan barisan.

column2: Change to the Tersio formation. Increases the defense of the squad member in the front row while provoking enemies.
column3: Berubah menjadi Formasi Tersio. Defense baris terdepan meningkat dan memancing musuh.

column2: Change to the Crane Wing formation. Decreases the defense of enemies within the formation while targeting the leader.
column3: Berubah menjadi Formasi Crane Wing. Berlari kedepan target dan defense musuh menjadi berkurang.

column2: Change to the Schiltron formation. All squad members will stop at once while raising their weapons to prevent from enemies rushing in.
column3: Berubah menjadi formasi Schiltron. Semua Pasukan berhenti dan mengangkat senjata untuk menahan musuh.

column2: Change to the Testudo formation. Increases the defense and block of all squad members while moving slowly.
column3: Berubah menjadi Formasi Testudo. Meningkatkan Defense dan Block dari semua pasukan dan bergerak lambat.

column2: Realign direction of formation to leader's view.
column3: Meluruskan kembali arah dari pandangan pemimpin.

column2: {#DD5500}{ol}[Physical] - [Strike]{/}{/}{nl}Hold your sword backwards and use its handle to smack down an enemy.
column3: {#DD5500}{ol}[Physical] - [Strike]{/}{/}{nl}Memegang pedang mundur dan menggunakan pegangan untuk memukul jatuh musuh.

column2: Doubles your EXP and loot dropped when you defeat an enemy within a certain number of attacks. You take 3x damage while the effect is active, and lose more durability when you become incapable of combat.
column3: Double Exp kamu dan hadiah ketika kamu mengalahkan musuh dengan sejumlah attack. Kamu menerima 3x damage ketika efek aktif dan mengurangi banyak durability ketika kamu tidak mampu bertempur.

column2: {#DD5500}{ol}[Physical] - [Slash]{/}{/}{nl}Use centrifugal force to continuously attack enemies.
column3: {#DD5500}{ol}[Physical] - [Slash]{/}{/}{nl}Menggunakan gaya sentrifugal dan terus menerus menyerang musuh.

column2: {#993399}{ol}[Magic]{/}{/}{nl}Gather powerful magical energy to launch it towards an enemy. Increases the inflicted damage depending on the amount of gathered energy.
column3: {#993399}{ol}[Magic]{/}{/}{nl}Mengumpulkan energi magic yang kuat untuk dilepaskan kepada musuh. Meningkatkan damage yang diciptakan tergantung dari jumlah energi yang terkumpul.

column2: Makes an enemy fall asleep. The enemy awakens once you've reached your limit of attacks.
column3: Membuat musuh jatuh tertidur. Musuh akan terbangun ketika kamu mencapai batas serangan.

column2: Creates a protective shield that reflects the amplified damage back to an enemy.
column3: Menciptakan perisai pelindung yang dapat membalikkan dan melipatgandakan damage kepada musuh.
{#993399}{ol}[Magic]{/}{/}{nl}Serangan berulang pada musuh dengan magic bullet.

column2: Reduces the casting time of skills.
{#993399}{ol}[Magic] - [Fire]{/}{/}{nl}Summons a fireball. Enemies touching the fireball will receive continuous flame damage.
column3: {#993399}{ol}[Magic] - [Fire]{/}{/}{nl}Memanggil Bola Api. Musuh yang tersentuh bola api akan menerima damage api secara berulang.

column2: {#993399}{ol}[Magic] - [Fire]{/}{/}{nl}Creates a wall of flames that continuously damages approaching enemies.
column3: {#993399}{ol}[Magic] - [Fire]{/}{/}{nl}Menciptakan tembok api yang dapat memberikan damage berulang mendekati musuh.

column2: Temporarily grants the Fire property to you and your party member's attacks.
column3: Maningkatkan Fire property untuk mu dan anggota party sementara.

column2: {#993399}{ol}[Magic] - [Fire]{/}{/}{nl}Inflicts damage by exploding a burning enemy.
column3: {#993399}{ol}[Magic] - [Fire]{/}{/}{nl}Memberikan damage dengan kemungkinan meledak yang membakar musuh.

column2: {#993399}{ol}[Magic] - [Fire]{/}{/}{nl}Summons a pillar of fire to inflict damage on enemies.
column3: {#993399}{ol}[Magic] - [Fire]{/}{/}{nl}Memanggil Pillar api untuk memberikan damage ke musuh.

column2: {#993399}{ol}[Magic] - [Fire]{/}{/}{nl}Attack by continuously fuming fire forward to enemies. Deals continuous flame damage to enemies.
column3: {#993399}{ol}[Magic] - [Fire]{/}{/}{nl}Serangan api yang menyembur secara terus menerus. Memberikan damage api ke musuh.

column2: {#993399}{ol}[Magic] - [Ice] - [Pierce]{/}{/}{nl}Launches a bolt of ice to an enemy that inflicts damage and has a chance to freeze the enemy.
column3: {#993399}{ol}[Magic] - [Ice] - [Pierce]{/}{/}{nl}Meluncurkan Ice Bolt kemusuh untuk menciptakan damage dan memiliki kemungkinan membekukan musuh.

column2: {#993399}{ol}[Magic] - [Ice] - [Pierce]{/}{/}}{nl}Spurt ice thorns and attack enemies in front with chance of freezing.
column3: {#993399}{ol}[Magic] - [Ice] - [Pierce]{/}{/}}{nl}Es Duri dan attack musuh di depan dengan kemungkinan membekukan.

column2: Creates a wall of ice that confines an enemy with a chance of freezing nearby enemies.
column3: Menciptakan tembok es untuk menjebak musuh dengan kemungkinan membekukan musuh disekitar.

column2: {#993399}{ol}[Magic] - [Ice]{/}{/}{nl}Smack frozen enemies in front. Can freeze one more enemy nearby.
column3: {#993399}{ol}[Magic] - [Ice]{/}{/}{nl}Memukul musuh yang membeku di depan. Dapat membekukan satu musuh lagi disekitar.

column2: Create ice tent to block and freeze enemy.
column3: Menciptakan tenda es untuk menahan dan membekukan musuh.

column2: Create strong wind to push away target. Use on frozen enemies to attack neaby enemies.
column3: Menciptakan angin kuat untuk mendorong target. Menggunakan musuh yang beku untuk menyerang musuh.

column2: {#993399}{ol}[Magic] - [Ice] - [Strike]{/}{/}{nl}Ride on huge snowball and smash enemy.
column3: {#993399}{ol}[Magic] - [Ice] - [Strike]{/}{/}{nl}Menaiki Bola Salju besar untuk memukul musuh.

column2: {#993399}{ol}[Magic]{/}{/}{nl}Concentrate on the the tip of your hand to inflict continuous damage with psychokinesis.
column3: {#993399}{ol}[Magic]{/}{/}{nl}Berkonsentrasi pada ujung tangan Kamu untuk menimbulkan kerusakan terus menerus dengan psikokinesis.

column2: {#993399}{ol}[Magic]{/}{/}{nl}Use psychokinesis to capture a target in front and throw it around.{nl}Inflicts damage by throwing the captured target in a direction using your arrow keys.
column3: {#993399}{ol}[Magic]{/}{/}{nl}Gunakan psikokinesis untuk menangkap target di depan dan membuangnya di sekitar.{nl}Memberikan damage dengan cara melempar target yang tertangkap menggunakan arah key.

column2: Swaps your position with that of the enemy.
{#993399}{ol}[Magic]{/}{/}{nl}Inflict damage on multiple enemies by pulling them to a targeted area causing them to collide with each other.
column3: {#993399}{ol}[Magic]{/}{/}{nl}Memberikan damagae pada beberapa musuh dengan menarik dan membuat mereka saling bertabrakan dalam wilayah yang ditargetkan.

column2: Lift nearby enemies up into the air. Enemies in the air are temporarily detected as a Flying-type.
column3: Mengangkat musuh terdekat ke udara. Musuh di udara untuk sementara terdeteksi sebagai Flight-type.

column2: Create a straight line gravitational force that pull the enemies.
column3: Membuat gaya gravitasi garis lurus yang menarik musuh.

column2: Link enemies, so that they share damage taken.
column3: Menghubungkan musuh, sehingga mereka akan berbagi damage yang diterima.

column2: Gather linked enemies to one area and make them collide with each other.
column3: Mengumpulkan musuh yang terhubung pada satu tempat dan membuat mereka bertabrakan satu sama lain.

column2: Link a party member to share buff effects with each other.
column3: Menghubungkan dengan anggota party untuk berbagi Buff.

column2: Use the higher ability beween you and linked ally.
column3: Menggunakan kemampuan yang lebih tinggi diantara kamu dan anggota yang terhubung.

column2: Enlarge the size of you and your party member's hand to increase attack.
column3: Memperbesar ukuran tangan kamu dan anggota party untuk meningkatkan damage.

column2: Shrink the size of your target. When used on small-sized enemies, there is a chance for them to disappear.
column3: Mengecilkan ukuran target. Target memiliki kemungkinan menghilang bila digunakan pada monster berukuran kecil

column2: Enlarge the size of your target. When used on overly large enemies, there is a chance to cause an explosion.
column3: Memperbesar ukuran target. Target memiliki kemungkinan meledak bila digunakan pada monster yang terlalu besar

column2: Enlarge the size of your and party members' hand holding shield and sub weapon to increase defense.
column3: Memperbesar ukuran tangan kamu dan anggota party yang memegang perisai dan sub weapon untuk meningkatkan pertahanan

column2: Enlarge the size of you and your party members' heads to increase INT.
column3: Memperbesar ukuran kepala kamu dan anggota party untuk meningkatkan INT

column2: {#993399}{ol}[Magic] - [Lightning]{/}{/}{nl}Release a surge of electricity to attack enemies in front of you.
column3: {#993399}{ol}[Magic] - [Electric]{/}{/}{nl}Melepaskan gelombang listrik terus menerus untuk menyerang musuh.

column2: {#993399}{ol}[Magic] - [Ice]{/}{/}{nl}Drop chunks of ice to continuously inflict damage on enemies.
column3: {#993399}{ol}[Magic] - [Ice]{/}{/}{nl}Menjatuhkan potongan es dan menimbulkan demage ke musuh terus-menerus.

column2: {#993399}{ol}[Magic] - [Fire]{/}{/}{nl}Summons Prominence. The summoned Prominence goes back and forth randomly, inflicting damage to targets.
column3: {#993399}{ol}[Magic] - [Fire]{/}{/}{nl}Summon Prominence. Prominence akan bergerak secara acak dan menimbulkan damage pada target.

column2: {#993399}{ol}[Magic] - [Fire]{/}{/}{nl}Drop meteors on the targeted area to inflict damage to an enemy.
column3: {#993399}{ol}[Magic] - [Fire]{/}{/}{nl}Jatuhkan meteor pada target area untuk menimbulkan damage.

column2: Summon the devil of card inserted in Grimore. Grimore can only equip Devil type monster card.
column3: Summon the devil of card dimasukkan di Grimore. Grimore hanya dapat menggunakan Devil jenis monster card.

column2: Order the summoned devil from the Grimoire to move and attack in a targeted area.
column3: Memerintahkan Devil Summon dari Grimoire untuk bergerak dan menyerang pada area target.

column2: Take control of the summoned devil from the Grimoire by riding it on top of its head.
Mutates the summoned devil from the Grimoire to the devil that is equipped as a secondary card in the Grimoire while maintaining its previous stats.
column3: Memindahkan Summon Demon dari Grimoire yang telah dilengkapi dari Slot Card cadangan di Grimoire dengan tetap mempertahankan status sebelumnya.

column2: Order the summoned devil to wait and guard a targeted area.
column3: Memerintahkan Demon Summon untuk menunggu dan menjaga area target

column2: {#993399}{ol}[Magic] - [Dark]{/}{/}{nl}Summon a familiar. The familiar rushes to an enemy that you attack or that attacks you, and then explodes itself.
column3: {#993399}{ol}[Magic] - [Dark]{/}{/}{nl}Summon Familiar. Spirit Rush untuk musuh saat karakter menyerang atau diserang, kemudian meledak dengan sendirinya.

column2: Summon the fire devil Salamion. It follows its master and attacks enemies.
column3: Summon Fire Demon Salamion. Mengikuti Master dan menyerang musuh

column2: Summon a servant. The servant will grant beneficial effects while following its master.
column3: Summon Servant. Servant akan mengikuti Masternya dan memberikan efek yang baik.

column2: Control time and temporarily increase attack speed of yourself or 1 ally in front.
column3: Kontrol waktu dan sementara tingkatkan attack speed dari diri sendiri atau 1 sekutu di depan

column2: Control time and make the monster appear again where it was killed.
column3: Kontrol waktu dan buat monster tersebut muncul lagi di mana ia terbunuh

column2: Stops time of monsters within the targeted area. Enemies do not receive damage when time is stopped.
column3: Hentikan waktu dari monster dalam area target. Musuh tidak menerima demage ketika waktu dihentikan

column2: Controls time to decrease the movement speed of enemies.
column3: Mengontrol waktu untuk menurunkan Movement Speed pada musuh.

column2: Control time and increase movement speed of yourself or 1 ally in front.
column3: Kontrol waktu dan tingkatkan kecepatan gerak diri sendiri atau 1 sekutu di depan

column2: Control time in an area, temporarily changing it back to its previous state.
column3: Mengontrol waktu disekitar area, sementara waktu mengubah kembali pada kondisi sebelumnya.
Attack Power #{SkillAtkAdd}#{nl}Kumpulkan mayat dari setiap jenis

column2: Make Shogos molded after the card inserted in Necronomicon. Necronomicon can equip only Animal, Plant, and Mutant type cards.
column3: Membuat Shogos dibentuk setelah kartu dimasukkan di Necronomicon. Necronomicon dapat melengkapi Animal, Plant, and Mutant type cards

column2: Use #{CaptionRatio}# each of {nl}Plant, Beast, Mutant corpse
{#993399}{ol}[Magic]{/}{/}{nl}Throw corpse parts on a targeted area to attack nearby enemies.
column3: {#993399}{ol}[Magic]{/}{/}{nl}Membuang bagian mayat ke target yang dituju dan menyerang musuh terdekat

column2: Attack #{SkillAtkAdd}#{nl}Splash #{SkillSR}#{nl}Use #{CaptionRatio}# each of{nl}Plant, Beast. Mutant monster corpse
column3: Attack Power #{SkillAtkAdd}#{nl}Splash #{SkillSR}#{nl}Use #{CaptionRatio}# setiap{nl}Plant, Beast. Mutant mayat monster

column2: {#993399}{ol}[Magic]{/}{/}{nl}Encircle yourself with corpse parts that will damage nearby enemies.
column3: {#993399}{ol}[Magic]{/}{/}{nl}Membuat lingkaran pada karakter dengan menggunakan potongan mayat dan menyerang musuh disekitarnya.

column2: Make a wall of corpse and block enemy attacks. Enemies attack nearby the wall becomes decomposed.
column3: Membuat dinding mayat dan memblok serangan musuh. Musuh yang menyerang akan terkena damage.

column2: Dirty Wall Count: #{CaptionRatio}#{nl}Dirty Wall Duration: 15 seconds{nl}{#339999}{ol}[Decompose]{/}{/} Duration: #{CaptionTime}# seconds{nl}{nl}Consumes #{CaptionRatio2}# each of {nl}Plant, Beast, Mutant Corpses
column3: Dirty Wall #{CaptionRatio}#{nl}Dirty Wall Durasi 15 detik{nl}{#339999}{ol}[Decompose]{/}{/} Durasi #{CaptionTime}# detik{nl}{nl}Gunakan #{CaptionRatio2}# setiap {nl}Plant, Beast, Mutant corpse

column2: Collect the corpse left over from where an enemy died.
column3: Mengumpulkan corps dari musuh yang telah mati.

column2: {#993399}{ol}[Magic]{/}{/}{nl}Explodes an item of yours on the ground to damage nearby enemies.
column3: {#993399}{ol}[Magic]{/}{/}{nl}Meledakkan item kamu di tanah untuk menyerang musuh

column2: Dig the ground and get ores for alchemy.
column3: Menggali tanah dan dapatkan ore untuk alchemy

column2: Opens a shop to roast and enhance gems. Reduces the penalty of an enhanced gem.
column3: Membuka sebuah toko untuk meramu dan meningkatkan nilai Gems. Mengurangi denda pada saat Enhance Gem.

column2: Combine two items to change abilities of an item. The combined item will have its Potential reduced and the abilities may become better or worse.
column3: Menggabungkan dua item untuk mengubah item abilities. Item kehilangan potensi dan ability dapat menjadi lebih baik atau lebih buruk.

column2: Extract fluid from herbs to create different potions.
column3: Ekstrak cairan dari ramuan untuk membuat ramuan yang berbeda.

column2: Use pluvial of alchemy to create a new item.
column3: Menggunakan Pluvial of Alchemy untuk membuat sebuah item baru.

column2: Battle in another dimension to awaken an item's Potential. You can use the item's hidden option when you win the battle, but its Potential will be reduced.
column3: Bertempur di dimensi lain untuk awaken Potential dari Item. Kamu mendapatkan hidden option dari Item setelah kamu memenangkan pertarungan, namun Potential akan berkurang.

column2: Each weapon has a different dungeon{nl}and Potential effects{nl}Maximum Level: 1
column3: Setiap senjata memiliki dungeon yang berbeda{nl}dan efek potensial{nl}Level 1 Master

column2: {#DD5500}{ol}[Physical] - [Missile]{/}{/}{nl}Fires a shot that penetrates enemies. Enemies close to one another may be skewered together.
column3: {#DD5500}{ol}[Physical] - [Pierce]{/}{/}{nl}Menarik bow dengan kuat dan menembakkan arrow lurus ke musuh. Target dapat terkena status Skewed bila ada musuh lain disekitar.

column2: {#DD5500}{ol}[Physical] - [Pierce]{/}{/}{nl}Kneel down to improve your concentration. Increases your attack and range.
column3: {#DD5500}{ol}[Physical] - [Pierce]{/}{/}{nl}Berlutut untuk meningkatkan focus. Attack Power dan range bertambah.

column2: Temporarily increases your movement speed while attacking.
column3: Attack dan movement speed bertambah sementara.

column2: {#DD5500}{ol}[Physical] - [Missile]{/}{/}{nl}Fires a shot that ricochets to a nearby enemy.
{#DD5500}{ol}[Physical] - [Missile]{/}{/}{nl}Demonstrate your strength by firing a shot that pushes enemies away.
column3: {#DD5500}{ol}[Physical] - [Pierce]{/}{/}{nl}Tarik busur dengan kuat untuk menembak dan target terdorong jauh.

column2: {#DD5500}{ol}[Physical] - [Pierce]{/}{/}{nl}Penetrate straight through the enemy by aiming with the tip of your arrow.
column3: {#DD5500}{ol}[Physical] - [Pierce]{/}{/}{nl}Gunakan ujung panah untuk membidik target dan tembus langsung.

column2: {#DD5500}{ol}[Physical] - [Pierce]{/}{/}{nl}Shoot an arrow with a high critical chance.
column3: {#DD5500}{ol}[Physical] - [Pierce]{/}{/}{nl}Menembak panah dengan tingginya tingkat dari critical.

column2: Attack speed decrease and ATK increase.
column3: Kecepatan menyerang menurun dan kekuatan menyerang meningkat

column2: {#DD5500}{ol}[Physical] - [Strike]{/}{/}{nl}Fires an arrow with a bomb attached. The arrow explodes after a short amount of time causing additional damage.
column3: {#DD5500}{ol}[Physical] - [Hit]{/}{/}{nl}Panah berapi dengan bom. Panah meledak setelah mengenai musuh.

column2: {#DD5500}{ol}[Physical] - [Pierce]{/}{/}{nl}Arrow is split to pieces and bounces off attacking nearby enemies.
column3: {#DD5500}{ol}[Physical] - [Pierce]{/}{/}{nl}Panah dibagi jadi beberapa potong dan memantul attack musuh di sekitar.

column2: {#DD5500}{ol}[Physical] - [Pierce]{/}{/}{nl}Run backwards and shoot multiple arrows forward.
column3: {#DD5500}{ol}[Physical] - [Pierce]{/}{/}{nl}Berjalan mundur dan menembak beberapa anak panah ke depan.

column2: Make a spiral arrow that penetrates the enemy. The shot gives 1 additional attack.
column3: Membuat spiral panah yang menembus musuh. Tembakan memberi 1 serangan tambahan.

column2: Deploys an upright shield to block hostile enemies and their ranged attacks.
column3: Buat standing shield untuk memblokir musuh dan enemy range attack

column2: Collect stones to use as bullets for Stone Shot. Stones cannot be obtained in towns.
column3: Mengumpulkan stones bullet untuk digunakan pada Stone Shot. Tidak dapat diperoleh di kota-kota.

column2: {#DD5500}{ol}[Physical] - [Pierce]{/}{/}{nl}Charge crossbow with multiple arrows and shoot towards enemy.
column3: {#DD5500}{ol}[Physical] - [Pierce]{/}{/}{nl}Charge Crossbow dengan beberapa anak panah dan tembak ke arah musuh.

column2: {#DD5500}{ol}[Physical] - [Strike]{/}{/}{nl}Demolish obstacles in front, inflicting damage to nearby enemies.
column3: {#DD5500}{ol}[Physical] - [Hit]{/}{/}{nl}Menghancurkan objek yang berada di depan dan memberikan damage ke musuh disekitar.

column2: Attack with your crossbow while moving quickly.
column3: Bergerak cepat saat menggunakan catapault attacks.

column2: {#DD5500}{ol}[Physical] - [Strike]{/}{/}{nl}Set up a rotating trap that inflicts damage to enemies within a radius.
column3: {#DD5500}{ol}[Physical] - [Hit]{/}{/}{nl}Memasang perangkap yang berputar, menyapu dan menimbulkan damage pada musuh dalam radius.

column2: {#DD5500}{ol}[Physical] - [Pierce]{/}{/}{nl}Set up a trap in front of you that fires a buckshot. It triggers by re-using the skill.
column3: {#DD5500}{ol}[Physical] - [Pierce]{/}{/}{nl}Memasang perangkap yang mengeluarkan ledakan. Aktifkan tombol skill 2 kali untuk meledakkan.

column2: {#DD5500}{ol}[Physical] - [Pierce]{/}{/}{nl}Set up a spring trap that activates once enemies step on it. Once the trap is activated, it will launch the enemies back far away.
column3: {#DD5500}{ol}[Physical] - [Pierce]{/}{/}{nl}Pasang perangkap yang memantul dari musuh ketika menginjak.

column2: {#DD5500}{ol}[Physical] - [Strike]{/}{/}{nl}Explode ally magic circle and inflict damage to enemy.
column3: {#DD5500}{ol}[Physical] - [Hit]{/}{/}{nl}Ledakan sekutu magic circle dan timbulkan demage kepada musuh.

column2: Hide a prepared trap from enemies.
column3: Menyembunyikan perangkap yang dipasang dari musuh.

column2: {#DD5500}{ol}[Physical] - [Pierce]{/}{/}{nl}Set up a trap that shoots arrows when an enemy touches the wire.
column3: {#DD5500}{ol}[Physical] - [Pierce]{/}{/}{nl}Memasang perangkap yang dapat menembakkan anak panah ketika musuh menyentuh kawat.

column2: {#DD5500}{ol}[Physical] - [Strike]{/}{/}{nl}Attach a bomb to an enemy. The enemy explodes when it comes in contact with other enemies.
column3: {#DD5500}{ol}[Physical] - [Hit]{/}{/}{nl}Menempelkan bom pada musuh. Akan meledak saat musuh saling bersentuhan.

column2: Your companion intimidates an enemy and prevents it from approaching. Enemies may be afflicted with [Fear].
column3: Companionmu mengintimidasi musuh dan menghalanginya agar tidak mendekat. Musuh dapat jatuh dalam ketakutan

column2: Order your companion to rush forward and attack the enemy.
column3: Membuat pendamping Rush maju untuk menyerang.

column2: Cures a poisoned ally. A poison status with a higher level than Detoxify cannot be healed, however its duration decreases.
column3: Menyembuhkan sekutu yang keracunan. Racun dengan tingkat yang lebih tinggi dari pada Detox tidak dapat disembuhkan tetapi menurunkan durasi.

column2: {#DD5500}{ol}[Physical] - [Poison] - [Pierce]{/}{/}{nl}Blow toxic arrow and inflict continuous damage.
column3: {#DD5500}{ol}[Physical] - [Poison] - [Pierce]{/}{/}{nl}Blow toxic arrow and inflict continuous damage.

column2: {#DD5500}{ol}[Physical] - [Poison] - [Pierce]{/}{/}{nl}Throw jar of Poison to create poisonous puddle. Enemies become poisoned when stepping on the puddle.
column3: {#DD5500}{ol}[Physical] - [Poison] - [Pierce]{/}{/}{nl}Lemparkan botol racun untuk membuat genangan beracun. Musuh menjadi kecanduan ketika menginjak genangan air.

column2: {#DD5500}{ol}[Physical] - [Poison] - [Pierce]{/}{/}{nl}Throw poison to inject a parasite into the enemy. Poisonous insects are born when the host is killed.
column3: {#DD5500}{ol}[Physical] - [Poison] - [Pierce]{/}{/}{nl}Lemparkan jepit rambut untuk parasit pada musuh. Serangga berbisa lahir ketika tuan rumah dibunuh.

column2: Hide yourself in an empty barrel to prevent attention from enemies. In this state, you are unaffected by a certain amount of physical attacks.
column3: Menyembunyikan diri dalam sebuah wadah yang kosong. Blok terhadap beberapa physical attacks

column2: {#DD5500}{ol}[Physical] - [Pierce]{/}{/}{nl}Shoot arrow that makes noise. Enemies nearby falls under fear.
column3: {#DD5500}{ol}[Physical] - [Pierce]{/}{/}{nl}Tembakan panah yang membuat kebisingan. Musuh di sekitar berada di bawah rasa takut.

column2: Temporarily hide yourself away from an enemy's vision. You become exposed when you jump or attack.
column3: Sementara menyembunyikan diri dari visi musuh. Kamu menjadi terkena ketika melompat atau menyerang.

column2: Distort the sense of distance to make attacks from allies possible outside their range.
column3: Mendistorsi arti jarak dan membuat serangan sekutu mungkin di luar jangkauan.

column2: Show hidden items and enemies within range.
column3: Tampilkan item atau musuh yang tersembunyi dalam jangkauan.

column2: Temporarily increases your Critical Chance when attacking enemies from behind.
column3: Sementara meningkatkan kesempatan critical ketika menyerang dari belakang musuh.

column2: Trick an enemy to lower its guard. Temporarily decreases the evasion of enemies in front of you.
column3: Trick musuh untuk menurunkan penjaga mereka. Evasion musuh di depan Menurun.

column2: Hide underground to conceal your appearance. In this state you can attack but cannot move.
column3: Sembunyikan di tanah. Kamu dapat menyerang tetapi tidak bisa bergerak.

column2: Steals the enemy's trap and magic circle. You may use it later when you need it.
column3: Mencuri perangkap musuh dan magic circle. Kamu dapat gunakan nanti ketika Kamu membutuhkannya.

column2: {#DD5500}{ol}[Physical] - [Strike]{/}{/}{nl}Temporarily increases the STR of you and your party members when a target dies and explodes from this attack.
column3: {#DD5500}{ol}[Physical] - [Hit]{/}{/}{nl}Musuh meledak saat dibunuh dengan serangan ini dan party strength Kamu sementara meningkat.

column2: {#DD5500}{ol}[Physical] - [Strike]{/}{/}{nl}Throw tear gas at a targeted area. The target becomes afflicted with [Blind].
column3: {#DD5500}{ol}[Physical] - [Hit]{/}{/}{nl}Melemparkan gas air mata pada area target. Musuh jatuh di bawah [Dark].

column2: {#DD5500}{ol}[Physical] - [Pierce]{/}{/}{nl}Continuously attack using your dagger. A double attack with a high critical rate may stun the enemy.
column3: {#DD5500}{ol}[Physical] - [Pierce]{/}{/}{nl}Membuat attack terus menerus menggunakan pedang. Double attack dengan critical tingkat tinggi  dan memiliki kesempatan musuh pingsan.

column2: {#DD5500}{ol}[Physical] - [Pierce]{/}{/}{nl}Launches a wide broadhead arrow. Inflicts bleeding on the enemy hit.
column3: {#DD5500}{ol}[Physical] - [Pierce]{/}{/}{nl}Menembak panah Broadhead. Musuh terpukul jatuh di bawah Bleed.

column2: {#DD5500}{ol}[Physical] - [Pierce]{/}{/}{nl}Launches a bodkin arrow that deeply penetrates the enemy. On hit, decreases enemies' defense and nullifies the magic that protects the enemy.
column3: {#DD5500}{ol}[Physical] - [Pierce]{/}{/}{nl}Tembak panah pisau belati dengan penetrasi yang kuat. Pertahanan musuh saat memukul sementara menurun dan membatalkan magic protecting musuh.

column2: {#DD5500}{ol}[Physical] - [Pierce]{/}{/}{nl}Launches a barbed arrow. The number of strikes depends on the enemy's defense type.
column3: {#DD5500}{ol}[Physical] - [Pierce]{/}{/}{nl}Menembak panah berduri. Pukulan tergantung pada jenis pertahanan musuh.

column2: {#DD5500}{ol}[Physical] - [Pierce]{/}{/}{nl}Launches an arrow that explodes an enemy in the form of a cross when killed.
column3: {#DD5500}{ol}[Physical] - [Pierce]{/}{/}{nl}Menembak panah yang meledakan musuh dalam bentuk salib saat dibunuh.

column2: {#DD5500}{ol}[Physical] - [Pierce]{/}{/}{nl}Flame fumes from area shot with arrow and attacks enemy.
column3: {#DD5500}{ol}[Physical] - [Pierce]{/}{/}{nl}Asap api dari daerah tembakan dengan panah dan attack enemy.

column2: {#DD5500}{ol}[Physical] - [Strike]{/}{/}{nl}Launches an arrow with explosives attached. Upon hitting its target, the arrow will explode after an amount of time and cause additional collateral damage.
column3: {#DD5500}{ol}[Physical] - [??]{/}{/}{nl}Menggantung bom panah dan menembak. Panah meledak setelah memukul musuh.

column2: {#DD5500}{ol}[Physical] - [Strike]{/}{/}{nl}Use speed to move fast while attacking when riding on top.
column3: {#DD5500}{ol}[Physical] - [Hit]{/}{/}{nl}Gunakan kecepatan untuk bergerak cepat saat menyerang ketika naik di atas.

column2: {#DD5500}{ol}[Physical] - [Strike]{/}{/}{nl}Shoot repeatedly in the opposite direction you are moving.
column3: {#DD5500}{ol}[Physical] - [Hit]{/}{/}{nl}Tembak berlawanan arah Kamu bergerak saat menjalankan.

column2: Set up a roost where the hawk can sit. The hawk will wait for the owner's order on the roost. The roost disappears when you move away from it.
column3: Pasang Perch di mana Hawk bisa menunggu. Hawk menunggu perintah pemilik pada Perch. Menghilang saat Kamu bergerak jauh dari Perch.

column2: Fly circling around target area. Range defense of enemies within target area decreases.
column3: Terbang berputar-putar di sekitar area target. Berbagai pertahanan musuh dalam penurunan target area.

column2: {#DD5500}{ol}[Physical] - [Strike]{/}{/}{nl}Your hawk circles above a targeted area and attacks enemies passing below.
column3: {#DD5500}{ol}[Physical] - [Hit]{/}{/}{nl}Mengapung di area target dan menyerang musuh yang lewat bawah.

column2: {#DD5500}{ol}[Physical] - [Strike]{/}{/}{nl}Throw a training doll and have your hawk attack the targeted area.
column3: {#DD5500}{ol}[Physical] - [Hit]{/}{/}{nl}Membuang hawk doll ke satu area dan menyerang area itu.

column2: Have your hawk carry you. While being carried, you can inflict damage to enemies below using your basic attacks without being harmed.
column3: Tunggu elang. Kamu tidak menerima demage sementara tergantung dan dapat membuat serangan normal pada musuh.

column2: {#993399}{ol}[Magic] - [Holy]{/}{/}{nl}Creates a magic circle that recovers HP or inflicts damage to enemies. Does not apply to airborne enemies.
column3: {#993399}{ol}[Magic] - [Holy]{/}{/}{nl}Membuat magic circle yang menyembuhkan HP atau menyerang musuh. Tidak berlaku untuk musuh flying.

column2: {#993399}{ol}[Magic] - [Holy]{/}{/}{nl}Creates a magic circle that removes a Lv1 status ailment from allies or inflicts damage to enemies. Does not affect airborne enemies.
column3: {#993399}{ol}[Magic] - [Holy]{/}{/}{nl}Membuat magic circle untuk menyembuhkan status abnormal teman atau menyerang musuh. Tidak berlaku untuk musuh flying.

column2: Creates a magic circle that decreases the defense of enemies over time.
column3: Membuat magic circle yang terus menerus mengurangi defense musuh.

column2: Creates a magic circle that increases the skill level of allies once.
column3: Membuat magic circle yang meningkatkan skill level 1 kali.

column2: Summon a holy torch to improve the HP recovery rate of nearby allies.
column3: Summon holy torch untuk meningkatkan HP recovery teman disekitar.

column2: Creates a magic circle that increases the critical abilities of allies or decreases the critical abilities of enemies.
column3: Membuat magic circle untuk meningkatkan critical teman atau mengurangi critical lawan.

column2: Increases the number of beneficial effects that you and your party members can receive.
column3: Meningkatkan jumlah buff yang dapat diterima anggota party.

column2: {#993399}{ol}[Magic] - [Lightning]{/}{/}{nl}Creates a magic circle that calls down bolts of lightning on an enemy using the God of Thunder's power.
column3: {#993399}{ol}[Magic] - [Electric]{/}{/}{nl}Menggunakan kekuatan Lightning untuk magic circle yang akan menjatuhkan petir pada musuh.

column2: Engraves a stigma on an enemy. Increases the STR and INT of you and your party members when the engraved enemy has been defeated.
column3: Memberikan tanda (Mark) pada musuh. STR dan INT kamu dan anggota partymu meningkat saat musuh yang telah ditandai tersebut mati.

column2: Creates a magic circle that temporarily maintains the beneficial effects of you and your party members.
column3: Membuat magic circle yang menjaga buff untukmu dan anggota party.

column2: {#993399}{ol}[Magic] - [Holy]{/}{/}{nl}Sprinkle holy water to increase the defense of you and your allies as well as inflict damage to enemies.
column3: {#993399}{ol}[Magic] - [Holy]{/}{/}{nl}Semprotkan holy water untuk meningkatkan pertahanan sekutu dan menimbulkan damage kepada musuh.

column2: Create a magic circle that increases the DEX of allies and decreases the evasion and Physical defense of enemies.
column3: Buat magic circle dimana sekutu DEX meningkat dan musuh menghindar dan penurunan pertahanan fisik.

column2: Give blessings that grant additional damage on attacks of party members.
column3: Berikan berkat yang memberikan damage tambahan pada serangan dari party members.

column2: Resurrects a target that has been defeated in combat.
Temporarily grants an additional Holy property attack to you and your party member's attacks.
column3: Untuk Sementara waktu memberikan Holy attribute pada serangan Kamu dan anggota party.

column2: {#993399}{ol}[Magic] - [Holy]{/}{/}{nl}Creates an exorcism circle that damages enemies inside, then deals continuous damage.
column3: {#993399}{ol}[Magic] - [Holy]{/}{/}{nl}Membuat exorcism circle melukai musuh yang berada di dalamnya serta memberikan damage terus menerus.

column2: Curse an enemy to decrease its magic defense and prevent recovery.
column3: Memberikan status curse pada musuh untuk menurunkan pertahanan magic dan mencegah recovery.

column2: {#993399}{ol}[Magic] - [Dark]{/}{/}{nl}Controls an enemy afflicted with a curse and inflicts damage from afar. Bonus damage is dealt on the 3rd attack.
column3: {#993399}{ol}[Magic] - [Dark]{/}{/}{nl}Mengendalikan musuh di bawah kutukan dan menimbulkan damage. Bonus damage berlaku untuk serangan ke 3.

column2: Use a monkey skull to lure zombies to the desired location.
column3: Gunakan monkey skull untuk menggiring zombie ke daerah yang diinginkan.

column2: Create magic circle that turns enemies killed into zombies.
column3: Membuat magic circle yang mengubah musuh yang tewas menjadi zombie.

column2: Throw a talisman to an ally that temporarily suppresses pain. The ally is invulnerable to any damage when the talisman is active, but receives the accumulated damage at once when the effect ends.
column3: Melempar Amulet ke target yang menghentikan rasa sakit. Target tidak menerima damage ketika efek diaktifkan tapi menerima damage akumulasi sekaligus ketika efek berakhir.

column2: {#DD5500}{ol}[Physical] - [Strike]{/}{/}{nl}Order zombies to celebrate. Zombies dance around target area and enemies touching the zombies receive damage.
column3: {#DD5500}{ol}[Physical] - [Hit]{/}{/}{nl}Memerintahkan zombie untuk berdansa. Zombie menari di sekitar area target dan bila musuh menyentuh zombie menerima damage.

column2: Install a Samedi pattern that represents death noir on the ground. Movement speed and max. HP of zombies and allies around the pattern increase.
column3: Memasang samdy pattern yang mewakili kematian noir di tanah. Movement speed dan max. HP zombie dan sekutu di sekitar pola meningkat.

column2: Install a Oguon pattern that represents strength noir on the ground. Strength of zombies and allies around the pattern increase.
column3: Pasang pola Ogue yang mewakili kekuatan noir di tanah. Kekuatan zombie dan sekutunya di sekitar pola meningkat.

column2: {#993399}{ol}[Magic]{/}{/}{nl}Detonates zombies near the targeted area and deals damage to nearby enemies.
column3: {#993399}{ol}[Magic]{/}{/}{nl}Ledakan zombie yang dekat area target dan menyerang musuh di sekitar.

column2: Carve a statue of Vakarine, the goddess of the Evening Star. {nl}You may warp to other areas through the Goddess Statue.
column3: Mengukir Statue Vakarine, Goddess of Evening Star. {nl}Dapat warp ke daerah lain melalui Statue.

column2: Carves a statue of Zemyna, the goddess of Earth.{nl}Decreases the SP cost for allies who are within the radius of the Goddess Statue.
column3: Mengukir Statue Zemyna, Goddess of Earth. {nl}Sekutu yang dekat Statue menggunakan lebih sedikit SP saat menggunakan skill.

column2: Carve a statue of Laima, the goddess of fate.{nl}Decreases the cooldown of your party members' skills within the radius of the Goddess Statue.
column3: Mengukir Statue of Laima, Goddess of Fate. {nl}Skill cooltime dari party members menurun bila dekatnya.

column2: Cooldown Duration: -#{CaptionRatio}#%{nl}Statue Duration: #{CaptionRatio2}# seconds{nl}Consumes 4 Cedar Wood
{#993399}{ol}[Magic] - [Fire]{/}{/}{nl}Carves an Owl Sculpture that attacks enemies in front of you.
column3: {#993399}{ol}[Magic] - [Fire]{/}{/}{nl}Mengukir an owl statue yang menyerang musuh.

column2: Carve a divine World Tree that silences nearby enemies.
column3: Mengukir holy tree yang membuat musuh disekitar terkena efek silence.

column2: Carves a statue of Goddess Ausrine of the Morning Star. You and your allies are granted invulnerability after rotating around the Goddess Statue 3 times.
column3: Mengukir Statue of Ausrine, Goddess of Morning Star. Kamu dan sekutu Kamu tidak menerima kerusakan setelah berputar di sekitar patung tiga kali.

column2: {#339999}{ol}[Blessing of the Goddess]{/}{/} Duration: #{CaptionRatio}# seconds{nl}Goddess Statue Duration: 30 seconds{nl}Consumes 4 Cedar Wood
column3: {#339999}{ol}[Blessing of Goddess]{/}{/} Durasi #{CaptionRatio}# detik{nl}Goddess Statue durasi 30 detik{nl}Gunakan 4 Cedar wood

column2: Move your spirit out of the body. The spirit can only move near the body.
column3: Mengeluarkan roh dari dalam tubuh. Roh hanya bisa bergerak di dekat tubuh.

column2: Move body to the spirit to unite again. Can only be used when spirit is out of body.
column3: Memindahkan tubuh ke dalam roh untuk bersatu kembali. Hanya dapat digunakan ketika roh berada di luar tubuh.

column2: {#993399}{ol}[Magic] - [Holy]{/}{/}{nl}Bind enemy to stop its movement and inflict damage.
column3: {#993399}{ol}[Magic] - [Holy]{/}{/}{nl}Ikat musuh untuk menghentikan gerakan dan menimbulkan damage.

column2: Decreases the STR, CON, INT, SPR and DEX of enemies nearby.
column3: Menurunkan STR, CON, INT, SPR, DEX musuh disekitar.

column2: {#993399}{ol}[Magic]{/}{/}{nl}Inflict damage on nearby enemies by separating your soul from your body to cause an explosion.
column3: {#993399}{ol}[Magic]{/}{/}{nl}Ledakan jiwa yang terpisah dari tubuh dan menimbulkan damage.

column2: Transfer your abilities to allies in front of you.
column3: Transfer kemampuanmu untuk sekutu di depan kamu.

column2: Basic attack on spirits when outside the body.
column3: Basic attack on spirits saat berada di luar tubuh

column2: Activate aura and increase HP recovery of allies nearby.
column3: Mengaktifkan aura dan menaikan HP recovery dari allies disekitar.

column2: Creates a magic circle which has a chance of converting enemies.
column3: Menciptakan magic circle yang memiliki kesempatan untuk merubah musuh.

column2: Temporarily increases the property resistances of you and your party members.
column3: Tingkatkan sementara attribute resistance Kamu dan party Anda

column2: Fire, Ice, Lightning Resistance: +#{CaptionRatio}# {nl}Poison, Earth Resistance: +#{CaptionRatio2}#{nl}Buff Duration: #{CaptionTime}# seconds
column3: Fice, Ice, Electric Resistance +#{CaptionRatio}# {nl}Poison, Earth Resistance +#{CaptionRatio2}#{nl}Buff Durasi #{CaptionTime}#detik

column2: Has a chance of instantly defeating Mutant or Devil-type enemies.
column3: Dapat membunuh mutant atau demon tipe musuh sekaligus.

column2: Make a protective wall that push away enemies and block them from entering.
column3: Membuat dinding pelindung yang mendorong pergi musuh dan memblokir mereka masuk.

column2: {#DD5500}{ol}[Physical] - [Strike]{/}{/}{nl}Temper your skin as hard as steel to inflict damage by bouncing back an enemy's attack.
column3: {#DD5500}{ol}[Physical] - [Hit]{/}{/}{nl}Membuat kulit keras seperti baja dan mementalkan serangan musuh untuk menimbulkan damage.

column2: Reflect attack amounting to target's Physical attack.{nl}Reflect damage +#{SkillAtkAdd}#{nl}Ranged projectile, cannot defend magic
column3: Reflect attack sebesar physical attack.{nl}Reflect damage +#{SkillAtkAdd}#{nl}Ranged projectile, cannot defend magic

column2: {#DD5500}{ol}[Physical] - [Strike]{/}{/}{nl}Use your trained fists to attack an enemy in quick succession.
column3: {#DD5500}{ol}[Physical] - [Hit]{/}{/}{nl}Gunakan tanganmu yang terlatih untuk menyerang musuh secara terus-menerus.

column2: {#DD5500}{ol}[Physical] - [Pierce]{/}{/}{nl}Continuously attack with the tip of your hand.
{#DD5500}{ol}[Physical] - [Strike]{/}{/}{nl}Break your target's armor with a strong strike using your hand as a knife.
{#DD5500}{ol}[Physical] - [Strike]{/}{/}{nl}Extend your fist from a close distance to destroy the insides of an enemy. The attacked enemy will steadily lose HP and SP.
column3: {#DD5500}{ol}[Physical] - [Hit]{/}{/}{nl}Memukul dari jarak dekat menghancurkan bagian dalam tubuh musuh. Musuh yang terkena serangan akan kehilangan HP dan SP terus menerus.

column2: {#DD5500}{ol}[Physical] - [Strike]{/}{/}{nl}Gather force then shoot forward. The enemy is pushed away and will receive damage.
column3: {#DD5500}{ol}[Physical] - [Hit]{/}{/}{nl}Mengumpulkan kekuatan kemudian tembak ke depan. Musuh terdorong dan menerima damage.

column2: {#DD5500}{ol}[Physical] - [Strike]{/}{/}{nl}Throw a coin by using the tip of your finger to inflict damage on an enemy.
column3: {#DD5500}{ol}[Physical] - [Hit]{/}{/}{nl}Melempar koin dengan ujung jari untuk memberikan damage pada musuh.

column2: Change to a state where you become temporarily invincible from all attacks.
column3: Mengubah statusmu sementara membuatmu menjadi kebal terhadap serangan apapun.

column2: Creates a dispeller that blocks harmful magic or effects.
column3: Buat dispeller yang memblokir magic berbahaya atau efek.

column2: Craft your skill into a scroll that anyone can use.
column3: Buat skill kamu dalam sebuah gulungan yang bisa digunakan siapapun.

column2: Open a shop to sell your skills with beneficial effects.
column3: Buat sebuah shop untuk menjual skill kamu dengan efek menguntungkan.

column2: Use a ritual to cure allies with a Lv2 status ailment or to inflict damage on enemies.
column3: Gunakan ritual untuk menyembuhkan teman dengan status Lv2 atau untuk menimbulkan damage pada musuh.

column2: Attack #{SkillAtkAdd}#{nl}Target #{CaptionRatio}#{nl}Heal all party members{nl}Heal #{CaptionRatio}# allies{nl}Use 500 silver
column3: Attack Power #{SkillAtkAdd}#{nl}Target #{CaptionRatio}#{nl}Heal semua anggota party{nl}Heal #{CaptionRatio}# allies{nl}Menggunakan 500 silver

column2: Open an Offering Box to receive donations from allies. Can only be opened nearby a Goddess Statue.
column3: Buat kotak penawaran untuk menerima sumbangan barang dari sekutu. Bisa dipasang dekat Goddess Statue saja.

column2: Extend the duration of harmful effects applied to an enemy.
column3: Memperpanjang durasi efek berbahaya yang diterapkan pada musuh.

column2: Penetrate into the mind of an enemy in front of you to control it.
column3: Menembus ke dalam pikiran musuh di depan dan mengendalikannya.

column2: {#993399}{ol}[Magic]{/}{/}{nl}Grass nearby target area attacks the enemy.
column3: {#993399}{ol}[Magic]{/}{/}{nl}Rumput terdekat dari area target attack musuh.

column2: Transform into a monster of the Animal-type, Plant-type or Insect-type in front of you for a given duration.
column3: Sementara berubah menjadi animal, plant, insect tipe monster di depan.

column2: Transform back into the monster that you last shape shifted to.
column3: Berubah kembali ke bentuk monster terakhir yang kamu pakai.

column2: Grass in the targeted area protects you and your party.
column3: Rumput di daerah sasaran melindungi Kamu dan party Anda.

column2: Grass temporarily grows on target area. Monsters entering the area become plant-type monsters.
column3: Rumput sementara tumbuh di daerah sasaran. Monster memasuki wilayah ini sebagai jenis tanaman.

column2: Randomly summons enemies to your front from the area you are currently in.
column3: Randomly summon monster di daerah yang sama untuk didepan Anda.

column2: Increases the maximum SP and STA of you and your party members.
column3: Meningkatkan max. SP dan STA kamu dan party.

column2: Changes the monster in front of you to a different monster with a similar level.
column3: Mengubah monster di depan jadi sebuah monster yang berbeda.

column2: Predict and show which item the monster will drop in advance.
column3: Memprediksi dan menunjukkan terlebih dahulu item apa yang akan diturunkan oleh monster
Membatalkan magic dari musuh di sekitar.

column2: Show in advance where the enemy will attack you and your party members.
column3: Memperlihatkan daerah dimana musuh akan menyerang kepadamu dan anggota partymu.

column2: Change enemy's drop item. Know if rare item will be dropped.
column3: Mengubah drop item musuh. Tahu kalau barang langka akan turun.

column2: Sentence the enemy to death. The sentenced target dies when time is up.
column3: Menghukum mati target. Target akan mati saat waktu membaca mantra selesai.

column2: Increased Fire, Ice, Lightning, Poison and Earth Property Resistance.
column3: Fire, Ice, Electric, Poison, Earth Resistance meningkat

column2: Increases STR, but decreases maximum Stamina
column3: Kekuatan meningkat sementara max. Stamina menurun.

column2: Status buff where Will of Guard buff can be activated
column3: Status buff di mana Will dari Guard buff dapat diaktifkan

column2: Increases damage against Devil-type targets by +125
Enemies hit with [Umbo Blow] fall down and pushing force is increased by 40 per attribute level.
column3: Musuh memukul dengan [Umbo Blow] jatuh dan mendorong kekuatan meningkat sebesar 40 per attribute level.

column2: Apply effect of Mordschlag on leather armor also to cloth armor type
column3: Terapkan efek dari Mordschlag pada baju kulit juga untuk kain jenis baju besi

column2: Hangman's Knot gives 20% of character's magic damage per attribute level as additional damage
column3: Hangman's Knot memberikan 20% dari karakter magic damage per attribute level sebagai damage tambahan

column2: Targets have 5% chance of falling under [Weaken Defense] per attribute level when hit with basic attack during spirit state.
column3: Target memiliki 5% kesempatan jatuh di bawah [Weaken Defense] per attribute level ketika memukul dengan serangan dasar selama spirit state.

column2: When using [Resist Elements] Fire, Ice, Lightning Property increase by 5 per Attribute level and Poison, Earth Property decrease by 5 per Attribute level
column3: Fire, Ice, Electric, Poison, Elemen Earth meningkat 1 per attribute level ketika menggunakan [Resist Elements].

column2: Monsters hit with [Pointing] have a 5% chance per attribute level of being inflicted with [Fear] every 3 seconds.
column3: Monsters ditusuk dengan [Pointing] memiliki 5% kesempatan per attribute level jatuh di bawah [Fear] setiap 3 detik.

column2: Defense of enemies receiving [Retrieve] attacks decrease by 10 per attribute level.
column3: Pertahanan musuh menerima [Retrieve] attacks mengurangi 10 per attribute level.

column2: Max. poison capacity of [Poison Pot] increases by 10 per attribute level.
column3: Max. Kapasitas racun [Poison Pot] meningkat 10 per attribute level.

column2: [Slowdown] is left after [Arrest]. Higher attribute level prolongs its duration.
column3: [Slowdown] yang tersisa setelah [Arrest]. Tingkat atribut yang lebih tinggi memperpanjang durasi.

column2: Count of [Weapon Repair] increase by 1 per level.
Count of [Armor Repair] increase by 1 per level.
Enemy falls under [Bleed] for 5 seconds when attacked with [Keel Hauling]. Duration of [Bleed] increases by a seconds per level.
column3: Musuh jatuh di bawah [Bleed] untuk 5 detik ketika attack dengan [Keel Hauling]. Durasi [Bleed] meningkat 1 detik per level.

column2: [Iron Skin] reflects additional damage of 20% of character's Physical attack per attribute level.
column3: [Iron Skin] reflects additional damage 20% dari character's physical attack per attribute level.

column2: Time of enemies stiffened with [Cross Guard] extends by 1 second per attribute level.
column3: Waktu musuh stiffened dengan [Cross Guard] memperpanjang 1 detik per attribute level.

column2: Damage of [Knock Heavy Shot] increase per attribute level.
column3: Damage dari [Knock Heavy Shot] meningkat per attribute level.

column2: Damage of [Heavy Shot] is enhanced to Archer Circle 3.
column3: Damage dari [Heavy Shot] enhanced ke Archer Circle 3.

column2: Damage of [Twin Arrow] increase per attribute level.
column3: Damage dari [Twin Arrow] meningkat per attribute level.

column2: Damage of [Teardown] increase per attribute level.
column3: Damage dari [Tear Down] meningkat per attribute level.

column2: Enhanced the damage of [Teardown] to Quarrel Shooter's 3rd Circle standards.
column3: Damage dari [Tear Down] enhanced ke Quarrel Shooter Circle 3.

column2: Increases the damage of [Running Shot] per attribute level.
column3: Damage dari [Running Shot] meningkat per attribute level.

column2: Enemies within rage of [Lachrymator] receives damage every 2 seconds. Damage increases per attribute level.
column3: Musuh dalam rage dari [Tear Gas] menerima damage setiap 2 detik. Damage meningkat per attribute level.

column2: Damage of [Magic Arrow] increase per attribute level.
column3: Damage dari [Magic Arrow] meningkat per attribute level.

column2: Enhanced the damage of [Magic Arrow] to Fletcher's 3rd Circle standards.
column3: Damage dari [Magic Arrow] enhanced ke Fletcher Circle 3.

column2: Duration of [Install Distribution Table] Salad increase by a minute per level.
column3: Durasi dari [Install Distribution Table] Salad meningkat satu menit per level.

column2: Duration of [Install Distribution Table] Sandwich increase by a minute per level.
column3: Durasi dari [Install Distribution Table] Sandwich meningkat satu menit per level.

column2: Duration of [Install Distribution Table] Soupincrease by a minute per level.
column3: Durasi dari [Install Distribution Table] Soup meningkat satu menit per level.

column2: Duration of [Install Distribution Table] Yogurt increase by a minute per level.
column3: Durasi dari [Install Distribution Table] Yogurt meningkat satu menit per level.

column2: Defense of [High Guard] increases by 1 per attribute level.
column3: Pertahanan [High Guard] meningkat 1 per attribute level.

column2: Defense of [Swell Right Arm] increases by 1 per attribute level.
column3: Pertahanan dari [Swell Right Arm] meningkat 1 per attribute level.

column2: Intelligence effect of [Swell Brain] increases per attribute level.
column3: Intelligence effect dari [Swell Brain] meningat per attribute level.

column2: Enemies [Unbinded] receive damage. Attack increase by 10% of magic attack per attribute level.
column3: Musuh [Unbinded] menerima damage. Attack meningkat 10% dari magic attack per attribute level.

column2: Damage of Spirit summoned by [Summon Familiar Spirit] increases per attribute level.
column3: Damage dari Spirit summoned [Summon Familiar Spirit] meningkat per attribute level.

column2: When summoned familiar spirit explodes itself, there 1% chance per attribute level for it to damage nearby enemies.
column3: Ketika summoned familiar spirit emeledak sendiri, ada 1% kesempatan per attribute level untuk itu untuk damage musuh terdekat.

column2: Character's SP recovery increase by 1 per attribute level.
column3: Character's SP recovery meningkat 1 per attribute level.

column2: There is a chance of enemy falling under decompose status for 30 seconds when attacked with [Flesh Canon]. Chance increases by 5% per attribute level.
column3: Ada kesempatan musuh jatuh dalam status membusuk selama 30 detik saat diserang dengan [Flesh Canon]. Kesempatan meningkat 5% per attribute level.

column2: Attak of enemies nearby the hoop after using [Flesh Hoop] decrease for 15 seconds. It turns back to normal when moving away from the hoop.
column3: Attack musuh di sekitar ring setelah menggunakan [Flesh Hoop] berkurang 15 detik. Kembali menjadi normal jika pindah menjauhi lingkaran itu.

column2: Decreases the amount of monsters in dungeons created with [Item Awakening] by 1.
column3: Monsters dibuat dalam dungeon dengan [Item Awakening] berkurang 1.

column2: Decreases the amount of waves in dungeons created with [Item Awakening] by 1.
column3: Mengurangi jumlah Waves di dalam dungeon menggunakan [Item Awakening] sebanyak 1 kali.

column2: Doubles the damage when hitting an enemy affected by the [Bleeding] status ailment with [Vendetta].

column2: Enemy falls under [Massive Bleed] status when attack with [Back Step] while bleeding.
column3: Musuh akan Menjadi status [Massive Bleed] jika attack dengan [Back Step] saat Bleeding.

column2: Enemies receiving [Magic Arrow] fire attacks have chance of falling under [Silence]. Chance increase by 10% per attribute level.
column3: Musuh menerima [Magic Arrow] fire attack memiliki kesempatan terkena [Silence]. Kesempatan meningkat 10% per attribute level.

column2: Enemies hit by [Divine Machine Arrow] are afflicted with [Shock] for 10 seconds.
column3: Musuh terkena [Shock] untuk 10 detik ketika dipukul dengan [Gather Corpse].

column2: Duration of [Revive] increase by 10 seconds per attribute level.
column3: Durasi dari [Revive] meningkat 10 detik per attribute level.

column2: Enemy falls under [Bleed] for 8 seconds when attacked with [Palm Strike]. Duration of [Bleed] incerases by a seconds per level.
column3: Musuh akan terkena [Bleed] untuk 8 detik ketika attack dengan [Palm Strike]. Durasi dari [Bleed] meningkat 1 detik per level.

column2: Enemies attacked with [Hand Knife] have chance of falling under [Armor Break]. Chance increases by 5% per attribute level.
column3: Musuh attack dengan [Hand Knife] memiliki kesempatan untuk terkena [Armor Break]. Kesempatan meningkat 5% per attribute level.
