column3: Meningkatkan efek physical defense dari [Cross Guard] sebesar 1 per attribute level.

column2: Increases the AoE Attack Ratio of [Wagon Wheel] by 1.
column3: Meningkatkan AoE Attack Ratio dari [Wagon Wheel] sebesar 1.

column2: Deals additional damage equal to 50% physical attack to knock backed enemies with [Cartar Stroke].
column3: Memberikan tambahan damage setara 50% physical attack dengan knock back musuh menggunakan [Cartar Stroke].

column2: The enemy that was attacked by [Skull Swing] will not be able to jump for 3 seconds.
column3: Musuh yang diserang dengan [Skull Swing] tidak dapat melompat selama 3 detik.

column2: The enemy that is attacked by [Pierce] will be in [Bleeding] for 5 seconds with 2% probability. Beeeding damage will be decided based on Physical ATK.
column3: Musuh yang diserang dengan [Pierce] akan terkena [Bleeding] selama 5 detik dengan kemungkinan 2%. Beeeding damage akan ditentukan berdasarkan pada  Physical ATK.

column2: Decreases [Strike] damage by 10%, and increases [Pierce] damage by 10% per attribute level of [Synchro Thrusting].
column3: Damage yang diberikan dengan [Synchro Thrusting] akan Mengurangi sebanyak 10% per Attribute level dan jumlah dari damage yang diberikan akan Meningkat by 10%.

column2: Increases AoE Attack Ratio by 3, but reduces evasion rate by x2 more of the existing value when [Finestra] is active.
column3: Range attack rate meningkat sebanyak 3 saat [Finestra] diaktifkan, Evasion Mengurangi rate dilipat gandakan.

column2: Decreases the cooldown time of [Long Stride] by 10 seconds.
column3: Waktu Cooldown dari [Long Stride] akan berkurang sabanyak 10 detik.

column2: Increases the physical damage increase effect of [Warcry] by 1 per attribute level. (This attribute only applies after the enemy's defense is decreased.)
column3: Additional Physical damage dari [Warcry] meningkat sebanyak 1 per Attribute level. (Attribute tersebut diterapkan setelah defense dari musuh berkurang.)

column2: Inflicts the target with [Slow] for seconds and increases the duration of [Slow] by 3/2/1 seconds per attribute level on small/medium/large sized monsters respectively with [Montano]
column3: Skill [Montano] akan memberikan target [Slow] selama 10 detik dan Durasi dari [Slow] akan Meningkat selama 3 detik/2 detik/1 detik berdasarkan pada Attribute level untuk ukuran monster small/medium/big.

column2: Spreads [Burn] equal to amount of your attribute level when killing nearby enemies affected by [Burn] with [Targe Smash].
column3: Menyebarkan [Flame] setara dengan jumlah attribute level saat membunuh musuh dalam [Flame] dengan [Target Smash].

column2: Enemies pushed back by [Rush] have a 1% chance per attribute level to be afflicted with [Stun] for 2 seconds.
column3: Ada kesempatan 1% per attribute level untuk musuh yang terdorong dengan [Rush] terkena [Stun] selama 2 detik.

column2: Changes the property of [Earth Wave] to the Earth property.
column3: Memberikan Earth Property pada serangan dari skill [Earth Wave]

column2: Applies [Slow] with a 4 seconds duration after [Arrest] ends. Increases the duration of [Slow] from Lv2 by 0.4 seconds per attribute level.
column3: [Slowdown] tersisa selama  4 detik setelah [Arrest], Durasi dari [Slowdown] akan Meningkat 0.4 dari Lv2 per Attribute level.

column2: An enemy hit with [Keelhauling] will be affected by the [Bleeding] status. Increases the duration of [Bleeding] by 1 second per attribute level, the bleeding damage is based on your STR.
column3: Musuh yang diserang dengan [Keelhauling] akan terkena [Bleeding] status. Durasi dari [Bleeding] akan Meningkat selama 1 detik per Attribute level, bleeding damage akan ditentukan berdasarkan pada  STR Karakter.

column2: Inflicts [Slow] when an enemy's attack is blocked while in the [Phalanx] formation. Increases the duration of [Slow] by 4 seconds per attribute level.
column3: Ketika serangan musuh di block saat berada dalam posisi [Phalanx], musuh akan terkena Slowdown. Durasi dari Slowdown akan Meningkat selama 4 detik per Attribute level.

column2: Increases reflect damage of [Reflect Shield] by 1 per attribute level and decreases damage received accordingly.
column3: Damage yang dikembalikan dari [Reflect Shield] akan Meningkat sebanyak 1 per Attribute level dan sebagai hasil, jumlah dari shooting damage akan berkurang.

column2: Increases the physical and magic attack debuff effect of [Lethargy] by 1 per attribute level.
column3: Physical attack dan Attack Mengurangi effect dari [Lethargy] meningkat sebanyak 1 per attribute level.

column2: Attack monster in [sleep] state with [Energy Bolt] to give additional damage of 50% of Magic attack.
column3: Menyerang monster dalam [sleep] status dengan [Enegry Bolt] untuk memberikan additional damage sebesar 50% dari Magic attack.

column2: Enemies hit by [Fireball] have a 10% chance per attribute level to receive flame damage  for 5 seconds. [Burn] damage is based on the character's INT.
column3: Musuh yang tertembak menggunakan [Fire Ball] akan menerima flame damage selama 5 detik dengan kemungkinan 10% per Attribute level. Flame damage akan ditentukan berdasarkan pada  INT Karakter.

column2: Increases the Fire property damage for 5 seconds by 5 per attribute level, when an ally steps on [Fire Wall].
column3: Saat ally menginjak [Fire Wall], Fire ATK akan Meningkat sebanyak 5 per Attribute level selama 5 detik.

column2: When an enemy is near [Enchant Fire] range, the enemy's Fire resistance will decrease by 10% for 5 secs.
column3: Saat musuh berada di dekat [Enchant Fire] range, Fire resistance musuh akan berkurang sebanyak 10% selama 5 detik.

column2: Enemies hit by [Magnetic Force] have a 5% chance per attribute level to become afflicted with [Stun] for 4 seconds.
column3: Musuh yang tertembak dengan [Magnetic Force] akan terkena [Stun] status selama 4 detik dengan kesempatan 5% per Attribute level.

column2: Enemies hit by [Hangman's Knot] will receive additional damage equal to 20% magic attack per attribute level.
column3: Musuh yang tertembak dengan [Hangman's Knot] akan menerima 20% damage lebih banyak dari magical damage karakter per Attribute level.

column2: Decreases the AoE defense ratio of the enemies gathered through [Hangman's Knot] by 1.
column3: Range defense rate musuh yang dikumpulkan dengan [Hangman's Knot] berkurang by 1.

column2: Attack increase effect of [Swell left Arm] Increase by 1 per Attribute level.
column3: Efek Attack meningkat dari [Swell left Arm] Meningkat sebanyak 1 per Attribute level.

column2: Defense and Attack increase effect of [Swell Right Arm] increases by 1 per attribute level.
column3: Defense dan Efek Attack meningkat dari [Swell Right Arm] meningkat sebanyak 1 per attribute level.

column2: Intelligence increase effect of [Swell Brain] increases by 1 per attribute level.
column3: Efek Intelligence meningkat dari [Swell Brain] meningkat sebanyak 1 per attribute level.

column2: Enemies affected by [Swell Body] will have their movement speed decreased by 25% and physical and magical attack increased by 20% per attribute level.
column3: Movement speed musuh akan berkurang sebesar 25% bagi yang ukurannya menjadi besar dengan [Swell Body] dan Physical dan Magical ATK rate akan Meningkat 20% per Attribute level.

column2: Enemies affected by [Shrink Body] will have their movement speed increased by 20% and physical and magical attack decreased by 25% per attribute level.
column3: Movement speed musuh akan Meningkat sebanyak 20% bagi yang ukurannya menjadi kecil dengan [Shrink Body] dan Physical dan Magical ATK rate akan berkurang sebesar 25% per Attribute level.

column2: Deals damage equal to 20% magic attack when changing the enemy's size with [Swell Body] per attribute level.
column3: Setiap ukuran dari musuh yang diubah dengan [Swell Body], damage lebih banyak akan dikeluarkan 20% dari Magical ATK rate per Attribute level.

column2: Deals damage equal to 20% magic attack when changing the enemy's size with [Shrink Body] per attribute level.
column3: Setiap ukuran dari musuh yang diubah dengan [Shrink Body], damage lebih banyak akan dikeluarkan 20% dari Magical ATK rate per Attribute level.

column2: When you attack an enemy affected by [Swell Body] while [Left Arm Enhancement] is active, it will continuously apply the [Attacked Weakened] status effect. Increases the duration by 8 seconds per attribute level and [Attacked Weakened] can stack up to 10 times.
column3: Saat kamu menyerang musuh yang dalam [Swell Body] ketika [Left Arm Enhancement] diaktifkan, Weakened ATK rate status terus berlangsung. Durasi akan Meningkat selama 8 detik per Attribute level dan [Weakened ATK] bisa ditumpuk maksimal 10 kali.

column2: Enemies hit by [Hail] have a 5% chance per attribute level to be afflicted with [Freeze] for 5 seconds.
column3: Setiap Musuh yang tertembak dengan [Hail], akan terkena [Freezing] dengan kemungkinan 5% per Attribute level selama 5 detik.

column2: Increases your evasion by 10% per attribute level while charging [Meteor].
column3: Ketika charging [Meteor], Evasion akan Meningkat sebanyak 10 per Attribute level.

column2: Using Fire property attacks to finish nearby enemies will cause an explosion and splash damage by 80% with a 30% chance.
column3: Menggunakan Fire Property attacks untuk menghabisi musuh akan menyebabkan ledakan dan splash damage sebesar 80% dengan kemungkinan 30%.

column2: Using Ice property attacks to finish enemies will slow down nearby enemies with a 50% chance for 6 seconds.
column3: Menggunakan Ice Property attacks untuk menghabisi musuh akan membuat slowdown musuh terdekat dengan kesempatan 50% selama 6 detik.

column2: Deals damage to nearby enemies with a 1% chance per attribute level when the summoned familiar of [Summon Familiar] explodes itself.
column3: Saat Spiritual Demon meledakan diri dari skill [Summon Spiritual Demon], akan memberikan damage musuh disekitar dengan kemungkinan 1% per Attribute level.

column2: Decreases the cooldown of [Attack Ground] by 2 seconds.
column3: Waktu Cooldown dari [Attack Ground] akan berkurang selama 2 detik.

column2: Decreases the cooldown of [Hold] by 2 seconds.
column3: Waktu Cooldown dari [Hold] akan berkurang selama 2 detik.

column2: Increases the duration of [Confusion] from Lv. 2 by 2 seconds per attribute level, after using [Backmasking], the enemies that will be pulled by aggro will be affected by [Confusion] for 6 seconds.
column3: Setelah menggunakan [Back Masking], musuh yang ditarik dengan Aggressive akan terkena [Chaos] selama 6 detik dan meningkat sebanyak 2 per Attribute level 2.

column2: Enemies hit by [Flesh Cannon] have a chance to be afflicted with Decay for 15 seconds. Increases the chance by 10% per attribute level.
column3: Saat musuh tertembak dengan [Flash Canon],  akan terkena Decay status selama 15 detik dengan kemungkinan tertentu. The rate akan Meningkat sebanyak 10% per Attribute level.

column2: Decreases attack of enemies for 4 seconds near the hoop after using [Flesh Hoop]. [Attack Weakened] can be stacked up to 10 times.
column3: Attack dari musuh disekitar Hoop setelah menggunakan [Flesh Hoop] berkurang selama 4 detik. [Weakened ATK] bisa ditumpuk maksimal 10 kali.

column2: Enemies near the Shoggoth will be afflicted with [Decay] for 15 seconds. Lasts for 1 minute per attribute level after Shoggoth is summoned.
column3: Musuh di dekat Shoggoth akan terkena Decay status selama 15 detik. Abillity ini akan bertahan selama 1 menit per Attribute level setelah Shoggoth di summon.

column2: Increases the range of [Disinter] by 10 per attribute level.
Decreases the cooldown of [Dig] by 10 seconds.
column3: Waktu Cooldown dari [Dig] akan dikurangi selama 10 detik.

column2: Increases the physical attack and magic attack for 30 minutes of allies that have participated in a [Item Awakening] dungeon. The attack increases by 20% per attribute level.
column3: Physical ATK dan Magic ATK akan ditingkatkan selama 30 menit untuk Ally yang berpatisipasi dalam [Item Awakening] dungeon. ATK akan Meningkat sebanyak 20% per Attribute level.

column2: When equipped with a [Two-handed Bow], adds 20% additional physical attack damage against airborne monsters.
column3: [Both hands bow] monster tipe umum saat dipasang akan memberikan 20% additional damage dari Physical attack.

column2: Enemies hit by [Oblique Shot] while [Swift Step] is active have a 5% chance per attribute level to be be afflicted with [Slow] for 7 seconds.
column3: Saat [Swift Steps] diaktifkan, musuh yang tertembak dengan [Oblique Shot] akan terkena [Slow] dengan kemungkinan 5% per Attribute level selama  7 detik.

column2: Decreases the physical defense of enemies by 10% per attribute level who are threaded with [Full Draw].
column3: Physical DEF dari musuh yang terkena [Full Draw] akan Mengurangi sebanyak 10% per Attribute level.

column2: Tumbleweed of [Broom Trap] will be reduced by 0.5 secs per Attribute level and the number of rotations will decrease by 0.5 per Attribute level.
column3: Tumbleweed dari [Broom Trap] akan dikurangi sebanyak 0.5 detik per Attribute level dan jumlah rotasi akan berkurang sebesar 0.5 per Attribute level.

column2: Increases the AoE attack ratio of [Claymore] by 1 per attribute level.
column3: Range attack rate dari [Claymore] akan Meningkat sebanyak 1 per Attribute level.

column2: When an enemy launched by [Punji Stake] hits the ground, it and nearby enemies will be dealt 50% of physical attack as damage.
column3: Musuh yang terbang di udara dengan [Punji Stake] terjatuh ke tanah, akan menerima damage setara dengan 50% dari Physical ATK dan musuh disekitar akan menerima damage.

column2: Decreases the physical defense of an enemy attacked with [Retrieve] by 10 per attribute level.
column3: DEF dari musuh yang diserang dengan [Retrieve] akan berkurang sebanyak 10 per Attribute level.

column2: Provides immunity to [Poison] for 2 seconds per attribute level to a character whose [Poison] has been cured due to [Detoxify].
column3: Karakter yang terkena [Poison] dihilangkan dengan [Detoxify] akan immune terhadap [Poison] selama 2 detik per Attribute level.

column2: Maintains [Poison] by 2 seconds per attribute level when enemies move outside the range of [Throw Gu Pot].
column3: Walaupun objek berada di luar Range dari [Throw Gu Pot], [Poison] akan bertahan selama 2 detik per Attribute level.

column2: Enemies within the range of [Scan] have a chance to be afflicted with [Confusion] for 5 seconds. Increases the chance by 10% per attribute level.
column3: Musuh yang berada dalam Range dari [Scan] akan terkena Confusion dengan kemungkinan tertentu selama 5 detik. Kemungkinan akan Meningkat sebanyak 10% per Attribute level.

column2: Enemies within the range of [Lachrymator] will receive damage equal to [attribute level] every 2 seconds. Increases the damage per attribute level.
column3: Musuh dengan rage dari [Tear Gas] menerima damage setiap 2 detik. Damage meningkat per attribute level.

column2: Inflicts the enemy with [Massive Bleeding] for 10 seconds when attacked with [Backstab] while affected by bleeding. Increases the duration by 1 second per attribute level. Massive Bleeding damage is proportional to the character's STR and physical attack.
column3: Musuh terkena [Massive Bleed] status ketika menyerang dengan [Back Step] saat bleeding selama 10 detik, Durasi akan Meningkat sebanyak 1 per Attribute level. the Massive Bleed akan ditentukan berdasarkan pada  STR Karakter, Physical ATK.
Range dari [Tear Gas] telah ditingkatkan sebesar 75.

column2: Further decreases an enemy's physical defense by 1% per attribute level when attacked by [Bodkin Point].
column3: Ketika Menggunakan [Bodkin Point] untuk menyerang, DEF musuh akan berkurang sebanyak 1% per Attribute level.

column2: [Crossfire] gets a 10% chance per level of inflicting [Burn] on targets for 6 seconds. Burn damage is proportional to the character's physical attack.
column3: Musuh yang terkena ledakan dari hit terakhir oleh skill [crossfire], pada setiap level tertentu dengan kesempatan 10% , selama 6 detik terkena [Flame]. damage flame disesuaikan dengan physical attack karakter.

column2: Enemies hit by the flames [Magic Arrow] will be afflicted with [Silence] by a certain chance. Increases the chance by 10% per attribute level.
column3: Musuh yang tertembak dengan [Magic Arrow] akan terkena [Silence] dengan kemungkinan tertentu. Kemungkinan akan Meningkat sebanyak 10% per Attribute level.

column2: Allows you to create arrows used for Fletcher skills. Arrow Crafting is available while in Rest Mode.
column3: Kamu dapat membuat arrows untuk Fletcher. Crafting arrow tersedia saat rest mode.

column2: Defense decrease effect of [Deprotected Zone] increases by 1 per attribute level.
column3: Defense Mengurangi effect dari [Deprotected Zone] meningkat sebanyak 1 per attribute level.

column2: Increases the chance of stun by 2% per attribute level when using a basic attack on enemies with a [Blunt] weapon type.
column3: Musuh yang terkena hit dengan [Blunt] memiliki 2% kesempatan per Attribute level untuk terkena Stun.

column2: Using basic sword attacks on enemies with [Deprotected Zone] will inflict [Weakened Defense]. [Weakened Defense] can be stacked up to 10 times.
column3: Menyerang menggunakan sword pada Musuh dengan [Depreotected Zone] terkena [Dereases defense]. [Dereases defense] bisa ditumpuk maksimal 10 kali.

column2: Increases the range applied by [Safety Zone] to 15.
column3: Range yang akan diterapkan pada [Safety Zone] akan ditingkatkan sebanyak 15.

column2: HP recovery of [Aukuras] increases by 1 per attribute level.
column3: HP recovery dari [Akurasi] meningkat sebanyak 1 per attribute level.

column2: Increases the character's Fire property resistance and decreases the Dark property resistance by 5 and 3 per attribute level respectively.
column3: Fire resistance Karakter akan Meningkat sebanyak 5 per Attribute level dan resistance pada Dark akan berkurang sebanyak 3 per Attribute level.

column2: [Zaibas] is affected by the character's AoE attack ratio and inflicts damage on multiple target at once. (Total count does not increase.)
column3: [Zaibas] dipengaruhi oleh Splash dan memberikan damage pada beberapa target sekaligus. (Jumlah total tidak Meningkat.)
Range yang akan diterapkan dengan [Melstis] akan ditingkatkan.

column2: Increases your Dark property resistance by 5 per attribute level when [Sacrament] is active.
column3: Saat [Sacrament] diaktifkan, Dark resistance akan Meningkat sebanyak 5 per Attribute level.

column2: Increases the duration of [Revive] by 7 seconds per attribute level.
column3: Durasi dari [Revive] akan Meningkat by 10 detik per Attribute level.

column2: Enemies hit by [Effigy] can become afflicted with [Blind] at a 5% chance per attribute level for 5 seconds.
column3: Setiap Musuh yang tertembak dengan [Effigy], dapat terkena [Blind] dengan kemungkinan 5% per Attribute level.

column2: Decreases the cooldown of [Statue of Goddess Vakarine] by 10 seconds.
column3: Waktu Cooldown dari [Carve Vakarine] akan berkurang.

column2: Increases the body's evasion by 10% per attribute level while [Out of Body] is active.
column3: Saat [Out of Body] diaktifkan, evasion karakter akan Meningkat sebanyak 10% per Attribute level.

column2: Decreases an enemy's physical defense by 30% with a chance of 10% per attribute level when using a basic attack in the Out of Body state.
column3: Ketika berada dalam Out of Body status, musuh yang tertembak dengan normal attacks akan terkena [Deprotect] dengan kemungkinan 5% per Attribute level.

column2: Decreases the SP cost of [Vashita Siddhi] by 10.
column3: SP consumption dari [Bashita Shidi] akan berkurang.

column2: Enemies within the range of [Vashita Siddhi] have a chance to be afflicted with [Confusion] for 5 seconds. Increases the chance by 10% per attribute level.
column3: Musuh yang berada dalam Range dari [Bashita Shidi] akan terkena Confusion dengan kemungkinan tertentu. Kemungkinan akan Meningkat sebanyak 10% per Attribute level.

column2: HP recovery effect of [Restoration] increases per attribute level
column3: Efek HP recovery dari [Restoration] meningkat per attribute level

column2: Increases the instant death chance of [Turn Undead] in proportion to the character's SPR
column3: Kesempatan Instant death dari skill [Turn Undead] juga mempengaruhi spiritmu.

column2: Damage that will be reflected off from [Iron Skin] will be added 20% of Physical ATK per Attribute level.
column3: Damages yang dikembalikan dari [Iron Skin] akan ditambahkan 20% dari Physical ATK per Attribute level.

column2: Enemies hit by [Palm Strike] will be afflicted with [Bleeding] for 8 seconds. Increases the duration of [Bleeding] by 1 second per attribute level. Bleeding damage is proportional to the character's physical attack.
column3: Musuh yang tertembak menggunakan [Palm Strike] akan terkena [Bleeding] selama 8 detik. Durasi dari [Bleeding] akan Meningkat selama 1 detik per Attribute level.

column2: Craft a dispeller to prevent from getting harmful effects. Craft Dispeller is only possible in Rest Mode.
Increases the duration of [Spell Shop] by 5 minutes per attribute level when you endow a registered effect to your ally.
column3: Ketika kamu memberikan efek ynag terdaftar pada [Spell Shop] pada rekanmj, Durasi akan ditingkatkan. Durasi akan Meningkat by 3 menit per Attribute level.

column2: Nearby enemies receive Holy damage equal to [attribute level] when using [Arcane Energy]
column3: Musuh disekitar menerima Holy damage Saat menggunakan  [Arcane Energy]. Damage meningkat per attribute level.

column2: Increases the duration of [Forecast] by 2 seconds per attribute level.
column3: Durasi dari [Forecast] akan Meningkat selama 1 detik per Attribute level.

column2: A monster that is transformed by [Change] will have the Item Jackpot Effect with a 0.05% chance per attribute level.
column3: Monster yang diubah dengan [Change] akan memiliki Item Jackpot Buff dengan kemungkinan 0.05% per Attribute level.

column2: Temporarily enlarge your party member's offhand, increasing attack if it is equipped with a shield or dagger.
column3: Memperbesar tangan kamu dan anggota party, serangan meningkat jika dilengkapi dengan shield atau dagger.

column2: Opens a shop to temper weapons and temporarily increase the attack power of a weapon.
column3: Membuka shop untuk memperbaiki weapon dan sementara meningkatkan performanya.

column2: Opens a shop to temper armor and temporarily increase defense. Repairs tops, bottoms and shields.
column3: Membuka shop untuk memperbaiki armor dan sementara meningkatkan performanya. Repair hanya untuk top, bottom dan shield.

column2: Set up a base camp for party members. Party members can use the base camp as storage or for teleportation. The duration of buffs used around the camp will increase.
column3: Memasang basecamp untuk party member. Party member bisa Menggunakan basecamp sebagai storage untuk teleport. Durasi dari buff yang digunakan disekitar camp akan Meningkat.

column2: Change to Tersio Formation. Defense is concentrated on the three frontline players and provokes enemy.
column3: Mengganti ke Tersio Formation. Defense di fokuskan pada 3 player garis depan dan provoke enemy.

column3: Mengirimkan #{CaptionRatio2}#% ATK pada pasukan{nl}#{CaptionRatio}# hit Ketika attack{nl}Menggunakan SP 1% setiap 2 detik

column3: Mengatur ulang pada baris dengan arahan leader. {nl}Master Lv 1

column2: Uses the highest abilities between you and allies linked by [Spiritual Chain].
column3: Menggunakan ability yang lebih tinggi antara kamu dan ally yang dihubungkan dengan Spiritual Chain.

column2: Shrink the size of your target.
Enlarge the size of your target. Increases the target's HP and maximum HP by its maximum HP. Doubles EXP gained and loot dropped.

column2: By manipulating time, you can let a monster appear at the same location where it was defeated.
column3: Mengendalikan waktu dan membuat monster kembali muncul ditempat yang sama saat terbunuh.

column2: Dig up the ground to collect materials required for alchemy.
column3: Menggali tanah dan mendapatkan material untuk alchemy.

column2: Enemies cannot jump when attacked with [Skull Swing].
column3: Musuh tidak dapat melompat ketika diserang dengan [Skull Swing].

column2: Enchant Fire: Decreased Fire Property Resistance
Reduces the Fire property resistance by 10% on nearby enemies when [Enchant Fire] is casted for 5 seconds per attribute level.

column2: [Stop] can also stop boss monsters but once released, it will not be stopped again.
column3: [Stop] bisa juga menghentikan boss monster namun sekali dilepaskan, tidak dapat dihentikan kembali.

column2: [Heal] will not inflict damage and react to enemies.
column3: [Heal] tidak memberikan damage pada musuh dan tidak bereaksi Ketika musuh masuk.

column2: Increases the maximum number of zombies from [Zombify] by 1.

Summon a devil based on the card placed in the Grimoire. The attack and defense of the summoned devil is affected by your INT and SPR respectively. The summoned devil's stats increase by 10% for each star on the card. Only Devil-type cards can be placed in the Grimoire.
column3: Memanggil Demon pada Boss Card yang telah didaftarkan ke dalam Grimoire. INT, SPR karakter mempengaruhi ATK dan DEF pada Demon yang di panggil. Ability meningkat sebanyak 10% per Card Stars. Grimoire hanya bisa dipakai pada Boss Card tipe Demon.

column2: Creates a Shoggoth based on the card placed in the Necronomicon. The attack and defense of the summoned devil is affected by your INT and SPR. Increases the abilities by 10% proportional to the amount of stars of the card. Only Animal, Plant and Mutant-type cards can be placed in the Necronomicon.
column3: Membuat Shoggoth berdasarkan pada kartu yang dimasukan pada Necronomicon. INT Karakter, SPR mempengaruhi ATK dan DEF dari iblis yang di summon. Ability meningkat sebanyak 10% per card star. Necronomicon bisa dipakai hanya pada Animal, Plant, dan Mutant type card.

column2: Your companion bites and holds onto a target. Decreases the physical defense of the bitten target. You receive a critical chance bonus against the target.
column3: Companion menggigit dan menahan target. Physical DEF target berkurang dan bonus kemungkinan critical diterapkan.

column3: Ketika kamu menyerang musuh dengan [Piercebing], Evasion dan Magic defense akan Meningkat sebesar 5% per Attribute level.

column3: Musuh yang diserang dengan [Pierce] akan terkena [Bleeding] selama 6 detik dengan kemungkinan 2%. Bleeding damage akan ditentukan berdasarkan pada  Physical ATK.

column3: Additional physical damage dari [Warcry] meningkat sebanyak 3 per Attribute level. (Attribute ini diterapkan setelah defense dari musuh berkurang.)

column2: Increases the attack increase effect of [Swell Left Arm] by 3 per attribute level.
column3: Efek Attack meningkat dari [Swell left Arm] Meningkat sebanyak 3 per Attribute level.

column2: Increases the defense and attack increase effect of [Swell Right Arm] by 3 per attribute level.

column3: Efek Intelligence meningkat dari [Swell Brain] meningkat sebanyak 2 per attribute level.

column2: Increases the physical damage increase effect of [Kneeling Shot] by 1 per attribute level.
column3: Physical Meningkat damage dari [Kneeling Shot] meningkat per attribute level.

column2: Increases the additional damage effect of [Steady Aim] by 2 per attribute level.
column3: Additional damage dari [Steady Aim] meningkat sebanyak 2 per attribute level.

column2: Increases the HP recovery of [Aukuras] by 1.5 per attribute level.
column3: HP recovery dari [Aukuras] meningkat sebesar 1.5 per attribute level.

column2: Increases the additional damage of [Blessing] by 2 per attribute level.
column3: Additional damage dari [Blessing] meningkat sebanyak 2 per attribute level.

column2: Increases the chance of obtaining materials for [Carve] by 1% per attribute level.
column3: Kemungkinan untuk mendapatkan ingredients meningkat 1% per Attribute level untuk [Carve].

column2: Increases the HP recovery effect of [Restoration] by 2 per attribute level.
column3: Efek HP recovery dari [Restoration] meningkat sebanyak 2 per attribute level.

column2: Your attacks are guaranteed to hit, increasing your Critical Rate and Critical Resistance.
column3: Serangan selalu akurat, serta Kemungkinan untuk Critical dan Critical Resistance meningkat.

Dapat mengenakan Armor dari turunan [Fabric]. Dan juga jumlah Armor [Fabric] yang dikenakan saat ini dan Max SP sesuai Property Level meningkat. (Berlaku jika memiliki Equipment turunan dengan Property yang sama diatas 3 buah)

Dapat mengenakan Armor dari turunan [Metal]. Dan juga jumlah Armor [Metalc] yang dikenakan saat ini dan Max HP sesuai Property Level meningkat. (Berlaku jika memiliki Equipment turunan dengan Property yang sama diatas 3 buah)

column2: [Cartar Stroke] no longer knocks enemies back. (Only applies if the attribute is set to ON)
column3: [Cartar Stroke] tidak lagi mendorong musuh kebelakang. (Hanya diterapkan bila attribute di set ON)

column2: While [Aggressor] is active, the character's added critical attack is proportional to the physical attack. Increases an addtional amount by 5% per attribute level.
column3: Ketika [Aggressor] diaktifkan, Critical Attack yang ditambahkan pada karakter sebanding dengan physical attack. Meningkatkan jumlah additional sebesar 5% per attribute level.

column2: [Earth Wave] no longer knocks enemies down. (Only applies if the attribute is set to ON)
column3: [Earth Wave] tidak lagi menjatuhkan musuh. (Hanya diterapkan bila attribute diaktifkan)

column2: [Steed Charge] no longer knocks enemies down. (Only applies if the attribute is set to ON)
column3: [Steed Charge] tidak lagi menjatuhkan musuh. (Hanya diterapkan bila attribute diaktifkan)

column2: [Doom Spike] no longer knocks enemies down. (Only applies if the attribute is set to ON)
column3: [Doom Spike] tidak lagi menjatuhkan musuh. (Hanya diterapkan bila attribute diaktifkan)

column2: Increases magic damage by 10% per attribute level when [Quick Cast] is active.
column3: Meningkatkan magic damage sebesar 10% per attribute level saat [Quick Cast] diaktifkan.

column2: Increases the Companion's movement speed of [Praise] by 5% per attribute level.
column3: Meningkatkan movement speed Companion dari [Praise] sebanyak 5% per attribute level.

column2: Enemies attacked with [Rush Dog] have a 10% chance per attribute level to be afflicted with [Stun] for 6 seconds.
column3: Musuh yang diserang dengan [Rush Dog] memiliki kesempatan 10% untuk terkena [Stun] selama 6 detik per attribute level.

column2: Deals damage equal to 50% of physical attack to enemies knocked into the air by [Smite], on landing. (This effect only activates when the attribute is ON)
column3: Memberikan damage dari 50% per the physical damage saat menjatuhkan musuh di udara, jika diserang dengan [Smite] skill. (Hanya diterapkan bila attribute diaktifkan)

column2: {#DD5500}{ol}[Physical] - [Strike]{/}{/}{nl}Attack an enemy by throwing your shield. Your shield drops on the targeted area, and your physical defense decreases based on the value of the equipment. The shield may be picked up or it'll automatically return to your inventory after a certain time. The decreased physical defense will return back to normal once your shield is back in the inventory.
column3: {#DD5500}{ol}[Physical] - [Strike]{/}{/}{nl}Menyerang musuh dengan melemparkan shield kamu. Shield kamu akan jatuh di wilayah yang ditargetkan, dan physical defense kamu menurun berdasarkan value dari equip. Shield dapat diambil atau secara otomatis akan kembali ke inventory kamu dalam jangka waktu tertentu. Physical defense yang menurun akan kembali normal setelah shield kamu masuk kembali ke dalam inventory.

column2: {#DD5500}{ol}[Physical] - [Strike]{/}{/}{nl}Heavily strike enemies using the spikes on your shield. Enemies struck by the skill may temporarily lose the effects from their armors.
column3: {#DD5500}{ol}[Physical] - [Strike]{/}{/}{nl}Membenturkan musuh dengan kuat menggunakan bagian metal pada shield kamu. Musuh yang terkena skill akan kehilangan efek armor mereka untuk sementara waktu

column2: {#DD5500}{ol}[Physical] - [Slash]{/}{/}{nl}Slash the enemy sideways.{nl}Inflicts additional damage on enemies affected by [Bleeding].
column3: {#DD5500}{ol}[Physical] - [Slash]{/}{/}{nl}Menebas musuh secara menyamping.{nl}Memberikan additional damage pada musuh yang terkena [Bleeding].

column2: {#DD5500}{ol}[Physical] - [Slash]{/}{/}{nl}Charge towards an enemy and cut a cross on their body, afflicting [Bleeding].
column3: {#DD5500}{ol}[Physical] - [Slash]{/}{/}{nl}Menyerang musuh dan menebas secara menyilang ke tubuh mereka, menyebabkan [Bleeding].

column2: {#DD5500}{ol}[Physical] - [Slash]{/}{/}{nl}Decreases the defense for medium, big enemies for a while by smaking down.
column3: {#DD5500}{ol}[Physical] - [Slash]{/}{/}{nl}Mengurangi defense untuk musuh ukuran medium, big untuk sementara saat smaking down.

column2: {#DD5500}{ol}[Physical] - [Pierce]{/}{/}{nl}Attack an enemy by throwing your spear. Your spear will stick into the ground where it was thrown, and your physical attack will be decreased based on the equipment's upgrade count until you pick it up. It automatically returns to you after a certain time.
column3: {#DD5500}{ol}[Physical] - [Pierce]{/}{/}{nl}Melemparkan spear untuk memberikan damage pada musuh. Spear akan menancap di tanah di tempat itu dilempar, dan physical attack kamu akan berkurang berdasarkan perhitungan upgrade equipment  sampai kamu mengambilnya. Akan kembali padamu secara otomatis setelah batas waktu.

column2: {#DD5500}{ol}[Physical] - [Strike]{/}{/}{nl}Strike the enemy's head, causing it to become afflicted with [Stun].
{#DD5500}{ol}[Physical] - [Slash]{/}{/}{nl}Create an earthshake to stop enemies from attacking. The enemy has a chance to become afflicted with [Stun].
column3: {#DD5500}{ol}[Physical] - [Slash]{/}{/}{nl}Membuat earthshake untuk menghentikan serangan musuh. Memungkinkan musuh terkena stun.

column2: {#DD5500}{ol}[Physical] - [Slash]{/}{/}{nl}Use centrifugal force and continuously attack enemies by turning body. Make an additional damage to the enemy stunned.
column3: {#DD5500}{ol}[Physical] - [Slash]{/}{/}{nl}Menggunakan centrifugal force dan menyerang musuh terus menerus dengan memutar tubuh. Memberikan additional damage musuh yang terkena.

column2: {#DD5500}{ol}[Physical] - [Slash]{/}{/}{nl}Use your shield and sword to successively attack enemies.
column3: {#DD5500}{ol}[Physical] - [Slash]{/}{/}{nl}Menggunakan shield dan sword milikmu untuk menyerang musuh secara beruntun.

column2: {#DD5500}{ol}[Physical] - [Strike]{/}{/}{nl}Interrupt an enemy's action by using your shield. The enemy is turned around, and cannot take any actions temporarily.
column3: {#DD5500}{ol}[Physical] - [Strike]{/}{/}{nl}Mengganggu pergerakan musuh dengan shield milikmu. Musuh berbalik, dan tidak dapat bergerak untuk sementara.

column2: {#DD5500}{ol}[Physical] - [Slash]{/}{/}{nl}Attack with your shield. The attacked enemy will have its stat points jumbled temporarily.
column3: {#DD5500}{ol}[Phyiscal] - [Slash]{/}{/}{nl}Menyerang dengan shield. Status point dari musuh yang diserang akan diacak untuk sementara.

column2: {#DD5500}{ol}[Physical] - [Strike]{/}{/}{nl}Perform a high kick to subdue an enemy. Hit enemies will temporarily take additional Strike damage.
column3: {#DD5500}{ol}[Physical] - [Strike]{/}{/}{nl}Melakukan high kick pada musuh. Musuh akan menerima additional damage dari Strike attack untuk sementara.

column2: {#993399}{ol}[Magic] - [Ice]{/}{/}{nl}Inflicts damage on a frozen enemy in front of you. There is a small chance to remove freeze from the enemy when it takes damage.
column3: {#993399}{ol}[Magic] - [Ice]{/}{/}{nl}Memberikan damage pada musuh yang beku didepanmu. Ada kesempatan kecil untuk menghilangkan efek freeze dari musuh saat terkena damage.

column2: Creates a curtain of ice for defense. Inflicts damage after successfully blocking an attack from an enemy. There is a certain chance to freeze nearby enemies.
column3: Menciptakan tirai dari es untuk bertahan. Memberikan damage setelah berhasil menahan serangan dari musuh. Ada kemungkinan tertentu untuk membekukan musuh disekitar.

column2: Creates a strong gust of wind that pushes enemies. When inflicting damage on a frozen enemy, it will unfreeze.
column3: Menciptakan hembusan angin yang kencang untuk mendorong musuh. Saat memberikan damage pada musuh yang beku, itu akan mencairkannya.

column2: Tighten the link to gather up the linked enemies in front of you.
column3: Mengencangkan link untuk mengumpulkan musuh yang terhubung didepan kamu.

column2: Temporarily increases the attack speed of you and your party members by manipulating time.
column3: Meningkatkan Attack Speed karakter dan anggota partymu dengan memanipulasikan waktu.

column2: Temporarily increases the movement speed of you and your party members by manipulating time.
column3: Meningkatkan Movement Speed karakter dan anggota partymu dengan memanipulasikan waktu.

column3: {#DD5500}{ol}[Physical] - [Pierce]{/}{/}{nl}Menyerang musuh dengan panah yang berputar menembus dan memberikan multiple strikes.

column2: Applies a poison once to the weapon of you and your party members for the next attack.
column3: Mengoleskan racun pada senjatamu dan party membermu sekali untuk serangan berikutnya.

column3: Menanam Samedi glyph pada tanah untuk menlambangkan Death Noir. Meningkatkan maximum HP dan movement speed karaktermu dan zombiemu didekat glyph. Hanya setengah dari efek yang diterapkan padamu.

column3: Kamu membuat pattern yang mewakili Ogu yang merupakan Rwa of Power ditanah. STR dari zombie didekat pattern akan meningkat.

column2: Push enemies away and create a barrier of protection which doesn't allow others to enter for some time. Increases the magic defense of allies who are inside the barrier.
column3: Mendorong musuh keluar dan menciptakan Wall of Protection yang tidak memperbolehkan yang lain masuk untuk beberapa lama. Itu akan meningkatkan DEF dari ally didalam wall.

column2: {#DD5500}{ol}[Physical] - [Strike]{/}{/}{nl}Attacks an enemy as an attack for the betrayer. Resistance to Fire, Ice, Lightning, Poison of the enemy that received the attack will decrease.
column3: {#DD5500}{ol}[Physical] - [Strike]{/}{/}{nl}Menyerang musuh sebagai serangan untuk pengkhianat. Resistance untuk Fire, Ice, Electricity, Poison dari musuh setelah menerima serangan tersebut akan berkurang.

column2: {#DD5500}{ol}[Physical] - [Strike]{/}{/}{nl}Use your trained fingertips to attack an enemy by inflicting an internal injury.
column3: {#DD5500}{ol}[Physical] - [Strike]{/}{/}{nl}Menyerang dengan jari yang terlatih dan memberikan internal damage pada musuh.

column2: {#DD5500}{ol}[Physical]{/}{/}{nl}Gather force then shoot forward. The enemy is pushed away and will receive damage.
column3: {#DD5500}{ol}[Physical]{/}{/}{nl}Mengumpulkan tenaga lalu menempak kedepan. Musuh akan terdorong dan menerima damage.

column2: {#993399}{ol}[Magic]{/}{/}{nl}Grass near the targeted area attacks an enemy. It casts in the place of [Chortasmata] first if it exists, otherwise it casts on you.
column3: {#993399}{ol}[Magic]{/}{/}{nl}Rumput didekat area yang ditargetkan akan menyerang musuh. Cast di tempat Chortasmata terlebih dahulu jika ada, jika tidak ada maka Cast padamu.

column2: Grown grass protects you and your allies. It casts in the place of [Chortasmata] first if exists, otherwise it casts on you.
column3: Menumbuhkan rumput yang melindungimu dan anggota partymu.  Cast di tempat Chortasmata terlebih dahulu jika ada, jika tidak ada maka Cast padamu.

column2: Grass temporarily grows on the targeted area. Monsters within the targeted area become Plant-type monsters.
column3: Rumput tumbuh di area yang ditargetkan untuk sementara. Monster didalam target area menjadi monster type-Plant.

column2: Grants a temporary effect preventing Lv. 1 status ailments to nearby party members.
column3: Memberikan efek sementara untuk mencegah efek berbahaya status Lv.1  pada party member terdekat.

column2: Increased movement speed and maximum HP.
column3: Meningkatkan Movement Speed dan maximum HP.

column2: In the state of Bwa Kayiman.
Applies one new deadly poison to your weapon for the next attack.
column3: Memberikan satu racun mematikan yang baru pada senjatamu untuk serangan selanjutnya.

column2: Able to equip [Cloth] armor. In addition, your maximum SP increases when you equip 3 or more pieces of [Cloth] armor. Your Magic Defense increases once you have 4 [Cloth] armor pieces equipped.
column3: Bisa menggunakan [Cloth] armor. Sebagai tambahan, maksimum SP-mu meningkat saat kamu menggunakan 3 atau lebih [Cloth] armor. Magic Defense karaktermu meningkat ketika kamu memilki 4 [Cloth] armor yang dipakai.

column2: Allows you to equip [Leather] armor.{nl}When equipped with 3 or more pieces of [Leather] armor, increases your Evasion.{nl} {nl}When equipped with 4 [Leather] armor pieces, your Evasion increases from attributes by an additional 50%.
column3: Bisa menggunakan [Leather] armor.{nl}Ketika menggunakan 3 atau lebih [Leather] armor, meningkatkan Evasion karaktermu.{nl} {nl}Saat menggunakan 4 [Leather] armor, Evasion meningkat dari attribute dengan tambahan sebesar 50%.

column2: Able to equip [Plate] armor. In addition, your maximum HP increases when you equip 3 or more pieces of [Plate] armor. Your maximum Stamina increases once you have 4 [Plate] armor pieces equipped.
column3: Bisa menggunakan  [Plate] armor. Sebagai tambahan, maksimum HP-mu meningkat saat kamu menggunakan 3 atau lebih [Plate] armor. Maksimum Stamina meningkat ketika kamu memiliki 4 [Plate] armor yang dipakai.

column2: {#DD5500}{ol}[Physical] - [Slash]{/}{/}{nl}Raises your sword and smashes the area around the center of the body. Deals additional damage on medium and large-type enemies according to how much their defense has been decreased by Skull Swing.

column3: Memperlambat kecepatan pemakaian Stamina milik Companion.

column2: When the HP of your companion is less than 50%, it will activate the [First Aid] effect and continuously recover HP. [First Aid] cannot be used for another 10 minutes after it has been activated.
column3: Ketika HP dari companion dibawah 50%, menerima [Emergency Treatment] untuk memulihkan HP terus menerus. Setelah [Emergency Treatment], [Can't be treated] status.

column2: Increases provocation when enemies attack by 50% per attribute level.
column3: Meningkatkan provocation saat musuh menyerang sebesar 50% per attribute level.

column3: Meningkatkan Block sebanyak 5% per attribute level saat menggunakan [Shield].

column3: [Skull Swing] tidak mendorong musuhmu lagi. (Saat attribute aktif, kamu tidak akan mendorong musuhmu lagi.)

column3: Meningkatkan damage yang diberikan pada musuh dengan [Spear Lunge] sebanyak 1% per attribute level.

column3: Meningkatkan block penetration kamu sebesar 10% per attribute level saat menggunakan [Two-handed Spear]

column2: Increases the damage dealt on an enemy with [Dust Devil] by 1% per attribute level.
column3: Meningkatkan damage yang diberikan pada musuh dengan [Dust Devil] sebanyak 1% per attribute level.

column2: Increases your [Pierce] damage by 5% per attribute level when equipped with a [Rapier]. (Does not apply to basic attacks)
column3: Meningkatkan [Pierce] damagemu sebanyak 5% per attribute level saat menggunakan [Rapier]. (Tidak berpengaruh pada Basic Attack)

column2: Increases the character's Fire property attack by 3 per attribute level when equipped with a [Staff].
column3: Meningkatkan serangan fire property kamu sebanyak 3 per attribute level saat menggunakan [Staff].

column2: Increases the damage dealt on an enemy with [Flame Ground] by 1% per attribute level.
column3: Meningkatkan damage yang diberikan pada musuh [Flame Ground] sebanyak 1% per attribute level.

column2: While equipped with a shield when [Subzero Shield] is active, there is an increase in counter attack damage based on your shield's defense. Counter attack damage is enhanced by 50% per attribute level.
column3: Ketika kamu block serangan musuh dengan [Sub-Zero Shield] saat menggunakan shield, akan ada counter attack damage yang lebih besar berdasarkan defense dari Shield. Counter attack damage akan menjadi 50% per attribute level.

column2: Increases magic defense and Ice property resistance equal to 25% of your equipped [Shield]'s defense per attribute level.
column3: Meningkatkan magic defense dan ice property resistance setara dengan 25% dari [Shield] defense yang kamu gunakan per attribute level.

column2: Increases the damage dealt on an enemy with [Frost Cloud] by 1% per attribute level.
column3: Meningkatkan damage yang diberikan pada musuh [Frost Cloud] sebanyak 1% per attribute level.

column2: Increases the damage dealt on an enemy with [Freezing Sphere] by 1% per attribute level.
column3: Meningkatkan damage yang diberikan pada musuh dengan [Freezing Sphere] sebanyak 1% per attribute level.

column2: Decreases the critical resistance of an enemy affected by [Slow] equal to 15% of your INT.
column3: Menurunkan critical resistance dari musuh yang terkena [Slow] setara dengan 15% dari INT kamu.

column2: Increases the attack of the summoned Shoggoth by 1 per attribute level.
column3: Meningkatkan serangan dari Shoggoth yang di summon sebanyak 1 per attribute level.

column2: Increases the attack of the summoned Corpse Tower by 1 per attribute level.
column3: Meningkatkan serangan dari Corpse Tower yang di summon sebanyak 1 per attribute level.

column2: Increases the attack of the summoned Skeleton Soldier by 1 per attribute level.
column3: Meningkatkan serangan dari Skeleton Soldier yang di summon sebanyak 1 per attribute level.

column2: Increases the chance of enlarging the size and maximum HP of the summoned Shoggoth by 1% per attribute level.
column3: Meningkatkan kesempatan memperbesar ukuran dan maksimum HP Shoggoth yang disummon sebanyak 1% per attribute level.

column2: Creates an explosion using 200 silver when there are no nearby dropped items.
column3: Menciptakan ledakan menggunakan 200 silver saat tidak ada drop item disekitar.

column2: Deals 20% additional damage per attribute level to Flying-type monsters when equipped with a [Two-handed Bow].
column3: Memberikan 20% additional damage per attribute level pada monster tipe Flying saat menggunakan [Two-handed Bow].

column2: Decreases the charging time of [Multi Shot] by half.
column3: Menurunkan charging time dari [Multi Shot] sebanyak setengahnya.

column2: Ignores the enemy's armor by 5% per attribute level when equipped with a [One-handed Bow]
column3: Mengabaikan armor musuh sebesar 5% per attribute level saat menggunakan [One-handed Bow]

column2: Increases the critical chance of [Spiral Arrow] by 10% per attribute level.
column3: Meningkatkan critical chance dari [Spiral Arrow] sebesar 10% per attribute level.

column2: Increases the damage dealt on an enemy with [Spiral Arrow] by 1% per attribute level.
column3: Meningkatkan damage yang diterima oleh musuh dengan [Spiral Arrow] sebanyak 1% per attribute level.

column2: Decreases the time of the first rotation by 0.3 seconds and increases the number of rotations for [Broom Trap] by 0.8 per attribute level.
column3: Menurunkan waktu putaran pertama sebesar 0.3 detik dan meningkatkan jumlah putaran sebanyak 0.8 untuk [Broom Trap] per attribute level.

column2: Increases the movement speed of your companion from [Praise] by 1 per attribute level.
column3: Meningkatkan movement speed Companion dengan [Praise] sebanyak 1 per attribute level.

column2: Increases the damage dealt on an enemy with [Split Arrow] by 1% per attribute level.
column3: Meningkatkan damage yang diberikan pada musuh dengan [Split Arrow] sebanyak 1% per attribute level.

column2: Increases your accuracy by 5% per attribute level when equipped with a Gun-type equipment.
column3: Meningkatkan accuracy kamu sebesar 5% per attribute level saat menggunakan equip type-Pistol.

column2: Deals 10% additional damage per attribute level to Mutant-type monsters when equipped with a [Revolver].
column3: Memberikan 10% additional damage per attribute level pada monster tipe Mutant saat menggunakan [Revolver].

column2: Causes instant kill on small-type monsters by 0.5% chance per attribute level when equipped with a [Rifle].
column3: Menyebabkan instant kill pada monster tipe small dengan kesempatan sebesar 0.5% attribute level saat menggunakan [Rifle].

column2: Deals damage equal to 100% magic attack to nearby Devil-type monsters when using [Divine Might].
column3: Memberikan damage setara dengan 100% magic attack kepada monster tipe Devil terdekar saat menggunakan [Divine Might].

column2: Increases the critical attack of [Zalciai] by 1 per attribute level.
column3: Meningkatkan critical attack dari [Zalciai] sebanyak 1 per attribute level.

column2: Enemies hit by [Hand Knife] have a 40% chance to be afflicted with [Armor Break] for 7 seconds. Increases the chance by 10% per attribute level from Lv2.
column3: Musuh yang diserang dengan [Hand Knife] memiliki kesempatan 40% untuk memberikan [Armor Break] selama 7 detik. Meningkatkan kemungkinan sebesar 10% per attribute level dari Lv. 2.

column2: {#DD5500}{ol}[Physical] - [Slash]{/}{/}{nl}Lift your sword up and perform a vertical strike downward. Medium and large size enemies suffering a defense reduction from [Skull Swing] take additional damage proportional to the reduced amount of defense. The enemy also takes additional damage according to the number of debuffs in effect.
column3: {#DD5500}{ol}[Physical] - [Slash]{/}{/}{nl}Mengayunkan pedangmu dan melakukan serangan vertikal kebawah. Musuh ukuran medium dan large menerima defense reduction dari [Skull Swing] mendapat additional damage sesuai dengan jumlah defense yang dikurangi. Musuh juga menerima additional damage berdasarkan jumlah efek debuff.

column2: {#DD5500}{ol}[Physical] - [Pierce]{/}{/}Stab an enemy in front of you.
{#DD5500}{ol}[Physical] - [Pierce]{/}{/}Lower your stance and reach out to attack an enemy. Your evasion rate increases and the enemy becomes more vulnerable to [Slash] attacks.
column3: {#DD5500}{ol}[Physical] - [Pierce]{/}{/}Menurunkan posisimu dan menggapai musuh untuk menyerang. Evasion rate kamu meningkat dan musuh menjadi lebih rentan terhadap [Slash] attack.

column2: {#DD5500}{ol}[Physical] - [Strike]{/}{/}Attack an enemy with the guard of your sword. The enemy's defense is ignored when attacked again with [Pierce] attacks.
column3: {#DD5500}{ol}[Physical] - [Pierce]{/}{/}Menyerang musuh dengan sarung pedangmu. Defense musuh diabaikan saat diserang lagi dengan [Pierce] attack.

column2: {#DD5500}{ol}[Physical] - [Pierce]{/}{/}Move swiftly to avoid enemy attacks and deliver complex successive attacks.
column3: {#DD5500}{ol}[Physical] - [Pierce]{/}{/}Bergerak cepat untuk menghindari serangan musuh dan memberikan serangan beruntun yang kompleks.

column2: Twirl the tip of your sword to parry an enemy attack and prepare for the next attack. The next [Pierce] attack you make will inflict twice as much damage.
column3: Memutar ujung pedangmu untuk menangkis serangan musuh dan mempersiapkan serangan selanjutnya. Serangan [Pierce] yang selanjutnya akan memberikan damage dua kali lipat.

column2: Maximum Duration: #{CaptionRatio2}# seconds{nl}+#{CaptionRatio}#% block during skill duration{nl}Duration: 15 seconds
{#DD5500}{ol}[Physical] - [Slash]{/}{/}Perform a complex upward attack with your rapier. This attack protects you against an enemy attack.
column3: {#DD5500}{ol}[Physical] - [Slash]{/}{/}Melakukan serangan keatas yang kompleks dengan rapiermu. Meningkatkan block rate kamu untuk sementara.

column2: {#993399}{ol}[Magic] - [Ice]{/}{/}{nl}Cast an arrow of ice that inflicts damage and has a chance of freezing the enemy.
column3: {#993399}{ol}[Magic] - [Ice]{/}{/}{nl}Melemparkan panah es yang memberikan damage dan memiliki kesempatan untuk membekukan musuh.

column2: {#993399}{ol}[Magic] - [Ice]{/}{/}{nl}Make ice spikes sprout out in a line to inflict damage. Has a chance of freezing enemies.
column3: {#993399}{ol}[Magic] - [Ice]{/}{/}{nl}Membuat Duri Es yang tumbuh pada garis, memberikan damage dan berkesempatan untuk membekukan musuh.

column2: {#993399}{ol}[Magic] - [Ice]{/}{/}{nl}Ride on an enormous snowball and crush any enemies in your way.
column3: {#993399}{ol}[Magic] - [Ice]{/}{/}{nl}Menaiki bola salju yang besar dan menghancurkan musuh yang menghalangi jalanmu.

column2: Attack: 400% +#{SkillAtkAdd}#{nl}Attribute Damage: #{CaptionRatio}#%{nl}Casting Time: #{CaptionTime}# seconds{nl}AoE Attack Ratio: #{SkillSR}#
column3: Attack: 400% +#{SkillAtkAdd}#{nl}Attribute Attack: #{CaptionRatio}#%{nl}Waktu Casting: #{CaptionTime}# Detik{nl}AoE Attack Ratio: #{SkillSR}#

column2: {#DD5500}{ol}[Missile]{/}{/}{nl}Quickly fires a number of arrows at a targeted area.
column3: {#DD5500}{ol}[Missile]{/}{/}{nl}Mengisi dan dengan cepat menembakan beberapa anak panah ke lokasi target.

column2: {#DD5500}{ol}[Missile]{/}{/}{nl}Pull your bowstring back to fire a highly piercing shot. Enemies hit are pinned onto the surrounding terrain.
column3: {#DD5500}{ol}[Missile]{/}{/}{nl}Menarik busurmu dan menembakan anak panah yang menembus musuh. Musuh yang saling berdekatan akan tertusuk bersama.

column2: Kneel down to improve your concentration. Increases your attack, attack speed and range.
column3: Berlutut untuk meningkatkan focus. Meningkatkan attack, range, dan attack speed.

column2: {#DD5500}{ol}[Missile]{/}{/}{nl}Fires an arrow that bounces off of the target to hit an adjacent enemy.
column3: {#DD5500}{ol}[Missile]{/}{/}{nl}Menembakan anak panah yang memantul ke musuh terdekat.

column2: {#DD5500}{ol}[Missile]{/}{/}{nl}Demonstrate your strength by firing a shot that pushes enemies away.
column3: {#DD5500}{ol}[Missile]{/}{/}{nl}Tembakan kuat yang mendorong musuh hingga menjauh.

column2: {#DD5500}{ol}[Missile]{/}{/}{nl}Fires two shots at once at an enemy.
{#DD5500}{ol}[Missile]{/}{/}{nl}Fires 5 arrows forward in an arc in front of you.
column3: {#DD5500}{ol}[Missile]{/}{/}{nl}Menembakan 5 anak panah kedepan secara menyebar dengan busur.

column2: {#DD5500}{ol}[Missile]{/}{/}{nl}Aim with the tip of your arrow and penetrate through enemies in front of you.
column3: {#DD5500}{ol}[Missile]{/}{/}{nl}Menembus langsung menuju musuh dengan membidik  dengan ujung panahmu.

column2: {#DD5500}{ol}[Missile]{/}{/}{nl}Fires an arrow with a high chance of critical at a target.
column3: {#DD5500}{ol}[Missile]{/}{/}{nl}Menembakan sebuah panah dengan Critical Rate yang tinggi.

column2: Increases the attack of [Missile] skills while decreasing the attack speed.
column3: Meningkatkan attack dari skill sebagai ganti dari attack speed yang dikurangi.

column2: {#DD5500}{ol}[Missile]{/}{/}{nl}Fires an arrow with a bomb attached. Upon hitting a target, the arrow will explode after an amount of time, dealing extra damage.
column3: {#DD5500}{ol}[Missile]{/}{/}{nl}Menembakan sebuah anak panah dengan bom. Panah akan meledak setelah beberapa lama dan menyebabkan damage tambahan.

column2: {#DD5500}{ol}[Missile]{/}{/}{nl}Fires an arrow that splits upon hitting a target to hit other adjacent enemies.
column3: {#DD5500}{ol}[Missile]{/}{/}{nl}Meluncurkan sebuah anak panah yang menyebar menjadi beberapa bagian dan memantul ke musuh disekitar.

column2: {#DD5500}{ol}[Missile]{/}{/}{nl}Fires a spiraling arrow that deals multiple hits to a target.
column3: {#DD5500}{ol}[Missile]{/}{/}{nl}Menyerang dengan sebuah anak panah spiral yang menyebabkan beberapa serangan.

column2: {#DD5500}{ol}[Missile]{/}{/}{nl}Jump backwards while firing multiple arrows forward.
column3: {#DD5500}{ol}[Missile]{/}{/}{nl}Berlari kebelakang dan menembakan beberapa anak panah kedepan.

column2: {#DD5500}{ol}[Missile]{/}{/}{nl}Fires a stone bullet to push an enemy away. The target has a chance to become afflicted with [Stun].
column3: {#DD5500}{ol}[Missile]{/}{/}{nl} Menembakan peluru batu yang membuat musuh terdorong kebelakang. Ada kesempatan untuk membuat target terkena stun.

column2: {#DD5500}{ol}[Missile]{/}{/}{nl}Load multiple arrows into your crossbow and then fire them in quick succession at an enemy.
column3: {#DD5500}{ol}[Missile]{/}{/}{nl}Mengisi crossbow dengan beberapa anak panah dan menembakannya kearah musuh.

column2: {#DD5500}{ol}[Missile] - [Poison]{/}{/}{nl}Blows a toxic arrow that inflicts damage over a long period of time.
column3: {#DD5500}{ol}[Missile] - [Poison]{/}{/}{nl}Melepaskan panah beracun dan menyebabkan damage terus menerus.

column2: {#DD5500}{ol}[Missile] - [Poison]{/}{/}{nl}Fires a contagious poison arrow. The poisoned target spreads poison around to nearby enemies whenever it is attacked.
column3: {#DD5500}{ol}[Missile] - [Poison]{/}{/}{nl}Meluncurkan panah dengan racun yang menular. Racun akan menyebar melalui target setiap terkena serangan.

column2: {#DD5500}{ol}[Missile]{/}{/}{nl}Fires a musical arrow to a target. Enemies nearby the target will be afflicted with [Fear].
column3: {#DD5500}{ol}[Missile]{/}{/}{nl}Menembakan panah yang membuat kebisingan. Musuh disekitar akan terkena fear.

column2: {#DD5500}{ol}[Missile]{/}{/}{nl}Fires a flare on the ground at a targeted area. Upon hitting the ground, the flare bursts into sparks that damages nearby enemies.
column3: {#DD5500}{ol}[Missile]{/}{/}{nl}Menembak panah kilat ke tanah. Kilat akan muncul dan menembakan percikan api ke musuh terdekat.

column2: {#DD5500}{ol}[Missile]{/}{/}{nl}Fires an arrow that, upon hitting a target, bounces to hit two nearby enemies.
column3: {#DD5500}{ol}[Missile]{/}{/}{nl}Memberikan damage pada dua musuh terdekat menggunakan panah yang memantul ketika mendaratkan serangan.

column2: {#DD5500}{ol}[Missile]{/}{/}{nl}If the target dies from this attack, it explodes. Party members gain STR for a period of time.
column3: {#DD5500}{ol}[Missile]{/}{/}{nl}Meningkatkan STR karaktermu dan anggota partymu untuk sementara ketika target mati dan meledak dari serangan ini.

column2: {#DD5500}{ol}[Missile]{/}{/}{nl}Fires a wide broadhead arrow. Inflicts [Bleeding] on the enemy hit.
column3: {#DD5500}{ol}[Missile]{/}{/}{nl}Meluncurkan Panah Broadhead yang lebar. Menyebabkan bleeding pada musuh yang terkena serangan ini.

column2: {#DD5500}{ol}[Missile]{/}{/}{nl}Fires a high-penetration bodkin arrow at an enemy. Lowers the defense of struck enemies and nullifies any protective magic.
column3: {#DD5500}{ol}[Missile]{/}{/}{nl}Meluncurkan panah jarum yang menembus musuh kedalam. Saat hit, menurunkan defense musuh dan menghilangkan magic yang melindungi musuh.

column2: {#DD5500}{ol}[Missile]{/}{/}{nl}Fires a barbed arrowhead. Deals a number of hits depending on an enemy's defense type.
column3: {#DD5500}{ol}[Missile]{/}{/}{nl} Meluncurkan panah berduri. Jumlah serangan tergantung pada jenis defense musuh.

column2: {#DD5500}{ol}[Missile]{/}{/}{nl}Fires an arrow that, upon hitting an enemy, creates a cross-shaped explosion.
column3: {#DD5500}{ol}[Missile]{/}{/}{nl} Meluncurkan panah yang meledak pada musuh.

column2: {#DD5500}{ol}[Missile]{/}{/}{nl}Fires an arrow, igniting flames that inflict damage over time on enemies entering the targeted area.
column3: {#DD5500}{ol}[Missile]{/}{/}{nl}Asap api dari area tembakan dengan panah dan menyerang musuh.

column2: {#DD5500}{ol}[Missile]{/}{/}{nl}Fires an arrow with explosives attached. Upon hitting its target, the arrow will explode after an amount of time and cause collateral damage.
column3: {#DD5500}{ol}[Missile]{/}{/}{nl}Meluncurkan panah dengan peledak. Setelah mengenai target, panah akan meledak setelah beberapa lama dan menyebabkan damage tambahan.

column2: {#DD5500}{ol}[Missile]{/}{/}{nl}Fires multiple bullets in rapid succession at an enemy.
{#DD5500}{ol}[Missile]{/}{/}{nl}Shoot forward while pushing yourself back with recoil.
{#DD5500}{ol}[Missile]{/}{/}{nl}Maneuver quickly with your mount and attack enemies in front.
column3: {#DD5500}{ol}[Missile]{/}{/}{nl}Menggunakan kecepatan untuk bergerak dengan cepat saat menyerang ketika naik diatas.

column2: {#DD5500}{ol}[Missile]{/}{/}{nl}Shoot repeatedly in the opposite direction you are moving.
column3: {#DD5500}{ol}[Missile]{/}{/}{nl}Menembak ke arah yang berlawanan saat kamu bergerak.

column2: Fires a shell to targeted enemies on the ground. Deals 50% damage on Flying-type enemies.
column3: Menembakan shell untuk musuh yang ditargetkan di tanah. Memberikan damage 50% pada musuh tipe Flying.

column2: Fires a shell to targeted airborne enemies. Deals 50% damage on enemies on the ground.
column3: Menembakan shell untuk musuh yang ditargetkan di udara. Memberikan damage 50% pada musuh ditanah.

column2: Fire on the ground using a howitzer. Enemies hit by the fire will knock down and deals 5x damage to the enemy's structure.
column3: Menembak ke tanah menggunakan Howitzer. Musuh yang terkena tembakan akan terjatuh dan memberikan 5x damage pada bangunan musuh.

column2: Deals damage to multiple enemies by launching a cannon in an arc shape towards the ground.
column3: Memberikan damage ke beberapa musuh dengan meluncurkan meriam berbentuk busur ke tanah.

column2: Maximum HP: +#{CaptionRatio}#{nl}Movement Speed: +#{CaptionRatio2}#{nl}Duration: #{CaptionTime}# seconds{nl}Glyph Duration: 15 seconds
column3: Maksimum HP: +#{CaptionRatio}#{nl}Movement Speed: +#{CaptionRatio2}#{nl}Durasi: #{CaptionTime}# detik{nl}Durasi Glyph: 15 detik

column2: Carve a statue of Ausrine, the goddess of the Morning Star. Those in your party who circle around the Goddess Statue counter-clockwise are granted divine protection and become immune to damage temporarily.
column3: Memahat patung Ausrine, Goddess of the Morning Star. Mereka yang berada didalam partymu yang berkumpul disekeliling patung berlawanan dengan arah jarum jam akan mendapatkan divine protection dan menjadi kebal terhadap damage untuk sementara.

column2: STR, CON, INT, SPR, DEX: -#{CaptionRatio}#{nl}Consumes SP per second{nl}Maximum Duration: 10 seconds
column3: STR, CON, INT, SPR, DEX: -#{CaptionRatio}#{nl}Menghabiskan SP per detik{nl}Durasi Maksimum: 10 detik

column2: You and your party members are temporarily granted an increase in fire, ice, lightning, poison, and earth resistances, and have a chance of nullifying attacks from those properties.
column3: Meningkatkan fire, ice, lightning, poison, dan earth resistance Kamu serta Party Membermu You untuk sementara, dan memiliki kesempatan untuk menghilangkan serangan dari properti tersebut.

column2: {#DD5500}{ol}[Physical] - [Holy]{/}{/}{nl}Harness energy and release it in front of you, dealing damage and pushing back all enemies in its path.
column3: Mengumpulkan energy dan menembakan ke depan. Musuh yang berada di depannya akan terkena damage dan terpental.

column2: Enemy's companion bites and holds. Decreased defense.
column3: Enemy's companion bites and holds. Decreased defense.

column2: Ignores defense by using Pierce-type attacks.
column3: Mengabaikan defense dengan menggunakan serangan tipe Pierce

column2: Increased Pierce-type attack upon the next attack
column3: Meningkatkan tipe serangan Pierce pada serangan berikutnya

column2: Increased chance of resisting Lv3 status ailments
column3: Meningkatkan persentase Resistance terhadap condition level 3 ke bawah

column2: Increased physical attack and magic attack
Increased physical defense and magic defense
Allows you to equip the [Rifle] weapon type.
column3: Memungkinkan kamu untuk menggunakan weapon jenis [Rifle].

column2: You can pay tax through the Master. A quick way to become a model citizen is by paying a lot and on time.
column3: Kamu bisa membayar pajak melalui Master. Sebuah cara cepat untuk menjadi warga negara teladan adalah dengan membayar banyak dan tepat waktu.

column2: Increases your physical defense by 10% per attribute level when [Guard] is active.
column3: Meningkatkan physical defense sebesar 10% per attribute level saat [Guard] diaktifkan.

column2: Increases block penetration by 10% per attribute level when attacking an enemy with a [Two-handed Spear].
column3: Ketika menyerang musuh dengan [Two-handed Spear] meningkatkan 10% block piercing rate setiap property level.

column2: Inflicts [Bleeding] on an enemy attacked with [Keel Hauling] for 5 seconds. Increases the duration of [Bleeding] by 1 second per attribute level. Bleeding damage is proportional to the character's STR.
column3: Musuh yang terkena serangan Skill[Kill Holing] maka akan terkena kondisi[Bleeding] selama 5 detik. Durasi dari [Bleeding] meningkat 1 detik setiap level property, damage bleeding merupakan proporsi dari kekuatan karakter.

column2: Sequentially fling up to 3 enemies with [Iron Hook]. You cannot use [Keel Hauling] while capturing multiple enemies. (Unable to turn ON/OFF during [Guard])
column3: Melempar secara berurutan ke 3 musuh dengan [Iron Hook]. Kamu tidak dapat menggunakan [Keel Hauling] saat menangkap beberapa musuh. (Tidak dpat diubah ON/OFF selama [Guard])

column2: Nullifies an enemy's attack by a certain chance when [Jolly Roger] is active. Applies the chance by 0.5% per attribute level and increases the chance depending on the amount of pirate members. (However, it does not apply if nobody other than you is a pirate member)
column3: Membatalkan serangan musuh dengan kesempatan tertentu saat [Zali Roger] aktif. Memberikan kesempatan sebesar 0.5% per attribute level dan meningkatkan kesempatan tergantung pada jumlah anggota pirate. (Namun tidak berlaku jika tidak ada pirate lain selain kamu)

column2: Increases your movement speed by 4 for 7 seconds per attribute level when opening a treasure chest.
column3: Meningkatkan movement speed sebanyak 5 selama 7 detik per attribute level saat membuka treasure chest.

column2: Increases your [Pierce] damage by 3% per attribute level when equipped with a [Rapier] as a main weapon, but without [Shield] as a sub-weapon. (Does not apply to basic attacks)
column3: Meningkatkan [Pierce] damage sebesar 3% per attribute level saat menggunakan [Rapier] sebagai main weapon, dan tidak menggunakan [Shield] sabagai sub-weapon. (Tidak berpengaruh untuk basic attack)

column2: Increases the damage dealt on an enemy with [Attaque Composee] by 1% per attribute level.
column3: Meningkatkan damage yang diberikan pada musuh dengan [Attaque Composee] sebanyak 1% per attribute level.

column2: Increases the damage dealt on an enemy with [Lunge] by 1% per attribute level.
column3: Meningkatkan damage yang diberikan pada musuh dengan [Lunge] sebesar 1% per attribute level.

column2: Increases the damage dealt on an enemy with [Sept Etoiles] by 1% per attribute level.
column3: Meningkatkan damage yang diberikan pada musuh dengan [Sept Etoiles] sebesar 1% per attribute level.

column2: Increases the damage dealt on an enemy with [Attaque Coquille] by 1% per attribute level.
column3: Meningkatkan damage yang diberikan pada musuh dengan [Attaque Coquille] sebesar 1% per attribute level.

column2: Increases the damage dealt on an enemy with [Esquive Toucher] by 1% per attribute level.
column3: Meningkatkan damage yang diberikan pada musuh dengan [Esquive Toucher] sebesar 1% per attribute level.

column2: Increases the damage dealt on an enemy with [Flanconnade] by 1% per attribute level.
column3: Meningkatkan damage yang diberikan pada musuh dengan [Flanconnade] sebesar 1% per attribute level.

column2: Increases the damage dealt on an enemy with [Kunai] by 1% per attribute level.
column3: Meningkatkan 1% Damage dari [Kunai] yang dikenakan kepada musuh setiap level Property.

column2: Increases the damage dealt on an enemy with [Katon no Jutsu] by 1% per attribute level.
column3: Meningkatkan 1% Damage dari [Katon no Jutsu] yang dikenakan kepada musuh setiap level Property.

column2: Increases the damage dealt on an enemy with [Mijin no Jutsu] by 1% per attribute level.
column3: Meningkatkan 1% Damage dari [Mijin no Jutsu] yang dikenakan kepada musuh setiap level Property.

column2: Your character will hide for 5 seconds after using [Mijin no Jutsu]. Increases the duration from Lv2 by 1.5 seconds per attribute level.
column3: Setelah menggunakan skill [Mijin no Jutsu] karakter menjadi dalam kondisi hide selama 5 detik. Durasi meningkat 1.5 detik setiap property level mulai dari level 2.

column2: Your character will hide for 2 seconds per attribute level after using [Katon no Jutsu].
column3: Setelah menggunakan skill [Katon no Jutsu] karakter setiap level property ,menjadi dalam kondisi hide selama 2 detik.

column2: Restricts movement of an enemy for 4 seconds when dealing damage with [Mokuton no Jutsu]. Increases the duration from Lv2 by 1 second per attribute level.

column2: Increases the damage dealt on an enemy with [Dragontooth] by 1% per attribute level.

column2: Creates a defense zone for 15 seconds where the spear is thrown. Increases physical defense and magic defense by 2% for party members within the zone.

column3: Pada lokasi tombak dilemparkan, akan menyebar Attack area selama 15 detik. Kawan yang berada di Attack area akan mendapat Attack Increase, sehingga Physical Attack dan Magic Attack meningkat 2%.

column2: The summoned servant grants beneficial effects more often.

column2: {#DD5500}{ol}[Physical] - [Pierce]{/}{/}{nl}Block and strike simultaneously by using both a sword and a shield.
column3: {#DD5500}{ol}[Physical] - [Pierce]{/}{/}{nl}Menahan sekaligus menyerang menggunakan pedang dan shield secara terus menerus.

column2: {#DD5500}{ol}[Physical] - [Slash]{/}{/}{nl}Attack with a descending vertical slash. Deals additional damage on medium and large-type enemies according to how much their defense has been decreased by [Skull Swing]. An additional bonus damage will be applied depending on the amount of harmful effect that have been applied to the enemy.
column3: {#DD5500}{ol}[Physical] - [Slash]{/}{/}{nl}Serangan vertikal dari atas ke bawah. Memberikan damage tambahan pada monster medium dan large-type sesuai dengan seberapa besar defense yang telah diturunkan menggunakan Skull Swing. Tambahan bonus damage akan diberikan bergantung pada besarnya efek bahaya yang telah diberikan kepada musuh.

column2: {#DD5500}{ol}[Strike]{/}{/}{nl}Impales a small or medium-type monster with a spear. It is possible to attack other enemies with a skewered enemy.
column3: {#DD5500}{ol}[Strike]{/}{/}{nl}Menusuk monster menggunakan Spear pada monster small atau medium type. Memungkinkan untuk menyerang musuh lainnya dengan cara menusuk lawan.

column2: Place a flag that raises the combat abilities of the pirate crew. A combo is activated if multiple enemies is defeated around the Jolly Roger. Attacking enemies around the Jolly Roger allows you to pillage items at a chance based on your Jolly Roger level. (Combo is only activated if the party leader is a Corsair.)
column3: Memasang bendera untuk Meningkatkan ability pertempuran pirate crew.Combo aktif jika monster dikalahkan disekeliling Zali roger. Pada selama tertentu, menyerang sembari mencuri item lawan dengan kemungkinan sesuai dengan level Skill Zali Roger, semakin tinggi level semakin besar kemungkinan mendapatkan item. (Combo aktif apabila ketua party adalah Corsair.)

column2: Counter-attack by tricking the enemy with a fake doll created from a log.
