column3: Untuk periode tertentu Meningkatkan resist dari serangan fire, ice, lightning, poison dan eart untuk sendiri dan anggota party. Kemungkinan membatalkan serangan elemen-elemen tersebut dan mengurangi defence magic musuh di sekitar pemain.

column2: Property Resistance: +#{CaptionRatio}#{nl}Nullification Chance: #{CaptionRatio2}#%{nl}Enemy's Magic Defense: -#{SkillFactor}#{nl}Duration: #{CaptionTime}# seconds
column3: Property Resistance: +#{CaptionRatio}#{nl}Property Attack Nullify Chance: #{CaptionRatio2}#%{nl}Enemy Magic Defense: #{SkillFactor}#{nl}Durasi: #{CaptionTime}# detik

column2: {#DD5500}{ol}[Physical] - [Strike]{/}{/}{nl}Strike with a powerful hand knife to deal damage on an enemy.
column3: {#DD5500}{ol}[Physical] - [Strike]{/}{/}{nl}Menyerang menggunakan hand knife dengan kekuatan penuh untuk memberikan damage pada musuh.

column2: Open an offering box to receive donations in the form of items from allies. Can only be opened nearby a Goddess Statue. Cannot be opened in town.
column3: Membuka Offering Box untuk menerima donasi dari sekutu, hanya bisa membuka di dekat patung Goddess. Tidak bisa dilakukan di kota.

column2: Able to register skills that consume items{nl}Additional Duration: #{CaptionRatio}# minutes
column3: Dapat mendaftarkan item yang akan mengkonsumsi item{nl}Additional Duration: #{CaptionRatio}# menit

column2: {#DD5500}{ol}[Physical] - [Strike]{/}{/}{nl}Attack an enemy by collecting money to offer to the gods. Enemies, with the exception of boss monsters, can be instantly killed at a 10% chance and the offered money can be picked back up again.
column3: {#DD5500}{ol}[Physical] - [Strike]{/}{/}{nl}Menyerang musuh dengan mengumpulkan uang yang dipersembahkan pada Goddess. Musuh selain tipe Boss dapat langsung terbunuh dengan kemungkinan 1/10 dan uang yang dipersembahkan bisa diambil kembali.

column2: {#993399}{ol}[Magic] - [Holy]{/}{/}{nl}Temporarily creates a magic circle that grants a healing factor. HP will be quickly recovered if you or your allies take damage from an enemy inside the magic circle.
column3: {#993399}{ol}[Magic] - [Holy]{/}{/}{nl}Menciptakan lingkaran magic yang dapat menyembuhkan HP. Jika diserang musuh selama kamu dan anggota party berada di dalam lingkaran, maka proses recovery HP akan lebih cepat.

column2: {#993399}{ol}[Magic] - [Fire]{/}{/}{nl}Incinerate enemies with status ailments. The duration of [Incineration] will increase depending on the amount of status ailments on enemies.
column3: {#993399}{ol}[Magic] - [Fire]{/}{/}{nl}Membakar musuh dengan status negatif. Durasi skill dapat meningkat tergantung dari status negatif yang diberikan.

column2: Temporarily let you or your allies bleed to prevent further status ailments. This state will be invulnerable to all rank 2 or lower status ailments.
column3: Untuk periode tertentu memberikan status bleed pada anggota party dengan tujuan mencegah status negatif. Dalam kondisi ini akan menjadi kebal dari status negatif denan tingkat lebih rendah.

column2: Spray a cloud of antidote that cures the status ailments of an ally. Allies within the effect will be cured of rank 3 or lower status ailments.
column3: Menebarkan penangkal status negatif kepada anggota party. Anggota party yang diberikan efek ini akan sembuh dari status negatif rank 3 atau di bawahnya.

column2: Removes rank 3 and lower status ailments{nl}Applies a maximum of #{CaptionRatio}# times
column3: Menghilangkan status negatif rank 3 atau lebih rendah{nl}Applies a maximum of #{CaptionRatio}# times

column2: Spread all status ailments on targeted enemies to other enemies within the range.
column3: Menebarkan status negataif pada satu musuh dan musuh lainnya dalam range tertentu.

column2: Equip the Bird Beak Mask. The front side of the mask has a special drug that prevents rank 2 or lower status ailments from affecting you.
column3: Memakai Bird Beak Mask. Bagian depan mask memiliki obat spesial untuk mencegah status negatif rank 2 ke bawah dari serangan musuh.

column2: Duration: #{CaptionTime}# seconds{nl}100% Immunity to Rank 1 and 2{nl}80% Immunity to Rank 3
column3: Durasi: #{CaptionTime}# detik{nl}100% Immunity to Rank 1 and 2{nl}80% Immunity to Rank 3

column2: {#993399}{ol}[Magic] - [Holy]{/}{/}{nl}Use the power of the goddess to avenge yourself with x7 the power of an enemy's attack.
column3: {#993399}{ol}[Magic] - [Holy]{/}{/}{nl}Menggunakan kekuatan Goddess  untuk membalas serangan dengan kekuatan 7x serangan musuh.

column2: {#993399}{ol}[Magic] - [Holy]{/}{/}{nl}Creates a magic circle that drastically increases your maximum HP for a period of time.
column3: {#993399}{ol}[Magic] - [Holy]{/}{/}{nl}Memasang lingkaran magic yang dapat Meningkatkan maksimum HP kamu secara drastis.

column2: Duration: #{CaptionTime}# seconds{nl}Magic Circle Duration: #{CaptionRatio2}# seconds{nl}Maximum HP: +#{CaptionRatio}#%
column3: Durasi: #{CaptionTime}# detik{nl}Magic Circle Durasi: #{CaptionRatio2}# detik{nl}Maximum HP: +#{CaptionRatio}#%

column2: {#993399}{ol}[Magic] - [Holy]{/}{/}{nl}Summons the wagon of the goddess to attack enemies.
column3: {#993399}{ol}[Magic] - [Holy]{/}{/}{nl}Memanggil wagon of the Goddess  untuk menyerang musuh.

column2: Divide the numbers of an enemy's name and calculate a new number.
column3: Membagi nama musuh menjadi nomor-nomor kemudian menghitung nomor baru.

column2: Calculate a new number from the first and the last letter of an enemy's name.
column3: Menghitung nomor baru dari yang pertama dan huruf terakhir dari nama musuh.

column2: If the enemy is hit with the amount of the calculated number, the enemy is hit by the multiplication of the number.
column3: Jika musuh terkena serangan dari jumlah yang telah dihitung, musuh terkena serangan berkali-kali dari jumlah nomor tersebut.

column2: Decrease the level of an enemy depending on the calculated number.
column3: Menurunkan level musuh sesuai dengan hasil penghitungan nomor.

column2: Makes the attacks of party members have the Holy property. Increases Holy property damage in proportion to the caster's [Sacrament] level which becomes more powerful when HP is below 40%.
column3: Menciptakan serangan elemen holy bagi anggota party. Damage yang dihasilkan sebanding dengan Sacrament level casternya dan akan lebih besar jika jumlah HP dibawah 40%.

column2: Deploys a temporary sacellum with a wrapped cloak. The caster and party members are able to simultaneously receive the effects of the caster's Aspersion, Monstrance, Blessing, Sacrament, Stone Skin.
column3: Menyebarkan sacellum dalam periode tertentu menggunakan dengan dibungkus jubah. Caster dan anggota party akan menerima efek caster's Aspersion, Monstrance, Blessing, Sacrament, Stone Skin.

column2: Cappella Duration: #{CaptionRatio}# seconds{nl}Effect Duration: #{CaptionRatio2}# seconds{nl}Consumes 1 Cape
column3: Cappella Durasi: #{CaptionRatio}# detik{nl}Effect Durasi: #{CaptionRatio2}# detik{nl}Consumes 1 Cape

column2: Transforms the Exorcise Magic Circle in front of the caster into an enormous pillar of exorcism. This divine pillar of light continues to damage nearby enemies.
column3: Mengubah Exorcise Magic Circle di depan caster menjadi light pillar of exorcism besar. Pillar of light ini terus menerus menyerang musuh di sekitar.

column2: Fills the equipped weapon with holy water and makes it splash with every attack. The level of holy water being used is the same level as the caster's [Aspersion].
column3: Mengisi senjata yang digunakan dengan divine water dan menyebar dalam tiap serangan. Level divine water yang ditebarkan sebanding dengan level Aspergillum casternya.

column2: Converts when being hit at a certain chance.
column3: Mengkonversi pada tingkat tertentu selama menyerang.

column2: Increased block, decreased attack and critical rate
column3: Meningkatkan Block, decreased attack dan critical rate

column2: Rate of blocking enemy attack increased.
column3: Rate of blocking enemy attack Increased.

column2: Penalty is eased during combat incapability while buff is active.
column3: Penalty dipakai selama tidak dapat bertempur dan buff masih aktif.

column2: Increased attack of Ice attribute skills.
Increased chance of resisting status ailments.
Decreases consumption and reduces recovery time of SP.
column3: Mengurangi penggunaa SP dan menurunkan waktu recovery SP.

column2: Increased recovery amount and recovery rate of HP, SP and STA.
column3: Meninkatkan recovery amount dan recovery rate of HP, SP dan STA.

column2: Increased magic amplification at the cost of reducing HP recovery rate to 0
column3: Mengorbankan recovery HP ke 0 dan Meningkatkan serangan magic.

column2: Shield reduced instead of HP when hit by enemies
column3: Shield reduced instead of HP when hit by enemies

column2: Increases Holy and Dark property attacks equal to 6% magic defense for 10 seconds when stacked 100 times.
column3: Meningkatkan serangan elemen Holy dan Dark sebanding dengan 6% magic defense selama 10 detik selama stak 100 kali.

column2: Light and Dark Property Attack Increase
column3: Serangan element Light dan Dark meningkat

column2: Increased magic defense and decreased physical defense
column3: Meningkatkan magic defense dan mengurangi physical defense

column2: HP won't be reduced by attacks until all the protections are used
column3: HP tidak akan berkurang dari serangan sampai semua proteksi digunakan

column2: Applies 5 hits to basic attack for every 5 times of [Bleeding].
column3: Memberikan 5 hits serangan dasar untuk setiap 5 kali [Bleeding].

column2: Applies additional damage of Effigy on the second attack
column3: Memberikan tambahan damage Effigy pada serangan kedua

column2: Increases Holy Property attack when used by Cleric-type characters
column3: Meningkatkan serangan elemen Holy selama digunakan karakter Cleric-type

column2: 5% increased EXP rate from Instanced Dungeon parties
column3: EXP Meningkat 5% dari party Instanced Dungeon

column2: 5% increased EXP rate from automatic Instanced Dungeon matching
column3: EXP Meningkat 5% dari automatic Instanced Dungeon matching

column2: - Able to learn up to 2 attributes simultaneously{nl} - Reduced Market commission fee (30% {img white_right_arrow 16 16} 10%){nl} - Able to list up to 5 items on the Market{nl} - +3 increased character movement
column3: - Dapat mempelajari 2 Attribute sekaligus{nl} - Mengurangi pajak Market (30%{img white_right_arrow 16 16}10%){nl} - Dapat mendaftarkan 5 item di Market{nl} - character movement meningkat +3

column2: +30% EXP from hunting monsters{nl}20% Reduced Market commission fee{nl}Able to list more items in the Market{nl}Able to learn up to 3 attributes simultaneously{nl}+3 increased character movement{nl}Doubled STA recovery rate
column3: +30% EXP dari hunting monsters{nl}20% Pajak market berkurang{nl}Dapat mendaftarkan item lebih di Market{nl}Dapat mempelajari 3 Attribute sekaligus{nl}Character movement meningkat +3 {nl}Recovery rate STA 2 kali lipat

column2: +30% EXP from hunting monsters{nl}Doubled STA recovery rate
column3: +30% EXP dari hunting monsters{nl}Recovery rate STA 2 kali lipat

column2: Able to enter Instanced Dungeons and Office Missions an unlimited amount of times.
column3: Bisa masuk Instanced Dungeons dan Office Missions setiap saat.

column2: Allows you to equip the [Pistol] weapon type. You can also press the C button to attack.
column3: Bisa menggunakan senjata tipe [Pistol]. Kamu juga bisa menekan tombol C untuk menyerang.

column2: Allows you to equip [Cloth] armor. When equipped with 3 or more pieces of [Cloth] armor, increases your maximum SP and magic damage taken is decreased by 5%. When equipped with 4 [Cloth] armor pieces, your magic defense increases and magic damage taken is decreased by an additional 10%.
column3: Bisa menggunakan [Cloth] armor. Jika menggunakan 3 macam [Cloth] armor, Meningkatkan jumlah SP dan magic damage yang diterima berkurang 5%. Jika menggunakan 4 [Cloth] armor , magic defense meningkat dan magic damage yang diterima berkurang sebesar 10%.

column2: Allows you to equip [Leather] armor. When equipped with 3 or more pieces of [Leather] armor, increases your evasion. When equipped with 4 [Leather] armor pieces, your evasion increases from attributes by an additional 50%.
column3: Bisa menggunakan [Leather] armor. Jika menggunakan 3 atau lebih [Leather] armor, meningkatkan evasion. Jika menggunakan 4 [Leather] armor, evasion meningkat dari Attribute dengan tambahan 50%.

column2: Allows you to equip [Plate] armor.{nl}{nl}When equipped with 3 or more pieces of [Plate] armor, increases your maximum HP and physical damage taken is decreased by 5%.{nl}When equipped with 4 [Plate] armor pieces, your maximum stamina increases and physical damage taken is decreased by an additional 10%.
column3: Bisa menggunakan [Plate] armor.{nl}{nl}Jika menggunakan 3 atau lebih [Plate] armor, Meningkatkan maximum HP dan physical damage yang diterima berkurang 5%.{nl}Jika menggunakan 4 [Plate] armor, maximum stamina meningkat dan physical damage yang diterima berkurang dengan tambahan 10%.

column2: Increases the Stamina reduction cycle of your companion by 10 seconds per attribute level.
column3: Meningkatkan durasi stamina companion hinga 10 detik per level attribute.

column2: When the HP of your companion is less than 50%, it will activate the [First Aid] effect and recover HP for 2 seconds. The duration is increased by 1 second per attribute level from Lv. 2. [First Aid] cannot be used for another 10 minutes after it has been activated.
column3: selama HP companion kurang dari 50%, [First Aid] effect akan aktif dan memulihkan HP selama 2 detik. Durasi meningkat selama 1 detik per level attribute dari Lv. 2.[First Aid] tidak dapat digunakan untuk 10 menit kemudian setelah diaktifkan.

column2: Increases the damage dealt with [Bash] by 28 per attribute level.
column3: Meningkatkan damage yang diberikan dari serangan [Bash] sebesar 35 per level attribute.

column2: Increases the physical attack, while your maximum HP decreases of [Restrain] per attribute level.
column3: Meningkatkan physical attack, sementara maximum HP berkurang dari [Restrain] per level attribute.

column2: Increases the maximum HP of your character by 5% per attribute level when [Swash Buckling] is active.
column3: Meningkatkan maximum HP karakter sebesar 5% per attribute level selama [Swash Buckling] aktif.

column2: Increases your physical defense by 10% per attribute level when [Guard] is active.
column3: Meningkatkan physical defense sebesar 10% per attribute level selama [Guard] aktif.

column2: Increases the character's evasion by 6% per attribute level when [Guardian] is active.
column3: Meningkatkan evasion karakter sebesar 6% per attribute level selama [Guardian] aktif.

column2: Adds critical attack proportional to physical attack when [Aggressor] is active. Increases by 5% per attribute level.
column3: Menambah kemungkinan serangan kritikal pada physical attack ketika [Aggressor] aktif. Memberikan tambahan sebesar 5% per attribute level.

column2: Increases the damage dealt on an enemy with [Shield Shoving] by 1% per attribute level.
column3: Meningkatkan damage yang diterima musuh menggunakan [Shield Shoving] sebesar 1% per attribute level.

column2: Increases the damage dealt on an enemy with [Shield Bash] by 1% per attribute level.
column3: Meningkatkan damage yang diterima musuh menggunakan [Shield Bash] sebesar 1% per attribute level.

column2: Enemies hit by [Slithering] become vulnerable to [Strike] attacks for 10 seconds. Increases additional damage by 20% per attribute level.
column3: Musuh yang terkena serangan [Slithering] menjadi mudah terkena serangan elemen selama 10 detik, Memberikan damage tambahan sebesar 20% per attribute level.

column2: [Targe Smash] no longer knocks enemies back.
column3: [Targe Smash] no longer knocks enemies back.

column2: Increases your block penetration by 10% per attribute level when equipped with a [Two-handed Spear].
column3: Meningkatkan block penetration sebesar 10% per attribute level selama menggunakan [Two-handed Spear].

column2: Increases the duration of Salad of [Refreshment Table] by 1 minute per attribute level.
column3: Meningkatkan durasi dari Salad of [Refreshment Table] selama 1 menit per attribute level.

column2: Increases the duration of Sandwich of [Refreshment Table] by 1 minute per attribute level.
column3: Meningkatkan durasi dari Sandwich of [Refreshment Table] selana 1 menit per attribute level.

column2: Increases the duration of Soup of [Refreshment Table] by 1 minute per attribute level.
column3: Meningkatkan durasi dari Soup of [Refreshment Table] selama 1 menit per attribute level.

column2: Increases the duration of Yogurt of [Refreshment Table] by 1 minute per attribute level.
column3: Meningkatkan durasi dari Yogurt of [Refreshment Table] selama 1 menit per attribute level.

column2: Increases the damage dealt on an enemy with [Pistol Shot] by 1% per attribute level.
column3: Meningkatkan damage yang diterima musuh menggunakan [Pistol Shot] sebesar 1% per attribute level.

column2: Decreases damage taken from x3 to x2 while [Double Pay Earn] is active.
column3: Mengurangi damage yang diterima menjadi x2 dari x3 selama [Double Pay Earn] aktif.

column2: Increases the damage dealt on an enemy with [Zonhau] by 1% per attribute level.
column3: Meningkatkan damage yang diterima musuh menggunakan [Zonhau] sebesar 1% per attribute level.

column2: Increases the damage dealt on an enemy with [Redel] by 1% per attribute level.
column3: Meningkatkan damage yang diterima musuh menggunakan [Redel] sebesar 1% per attribute level.

column2: Increases the damage dealt on an enemy with [Zucken] by 1% per attribute level.
column3: Meningkatkan damage yang diterima musuh menggunakan [Zucken] sebesar 1% per attribute level.

column2: Increases the chance to block harmful effects by 15% per attribute level during [Cyclone].
column3: Meningkatkan blok dari serangan fatal sebesar 15% per attribute level selama [Cyclone].

column2: Increases the Stamina reduction cycle of [Bunshin no Jutsu] by 0.05 seconds per attribute level.
column3: Meningkatkan STA cost cycle durasi sebesar 0.05% detik per attribute level selama [Bunshin no Jutsu] aktif.

column2: Decreases damage taken by 4% per attribute level when there are at least 2 clones from [Bunshin no Jutsu].
column3: Mengurangi damage yang dierima sebesar 4% per attribute level selama memiliki 2 clones dari [Bunshin no Jutsu].

column2: Increases the damage dealt on an enemy with [Serpentine] by 1% per attribute level.
column3: Meningkatkan damage yang diterima musuh menggunakan [Serpentine] sebesar 1% per attribute level.

column2: Enemies hit by [Serpentine] have a 2% chance per attribute level to become afflicted with [Bleeding] for 8 seconds. Bleeding damage is proportional to the character's physical attack.
column3: Memberikan efek [Bleeding] sebesar 2% per attribute level [Serpentine] selama 8 detik. Damage Bleeding disesuaikan dengan physical attack karakter.

column2: Two-handed Spear Mastery: Big Game Hunter
column3: Two-handed Spear Mastery: Large-Type Target Hunter

column2: Increases the damage dealt on large enemies while using a [Two-handed Spear]. Increases by 4% and 2% per attribute level against large enemies and boss monsters, respectively.
column3: Meningkatkan damage yang diterima musuh menggunakan [Two-handed Spear]. Meningkatkan 4% per attribute level pada musuh large-type dan 2% per attribute level pada bos monster.

column2: Enhanced the damage of [Energy Bolt] to Wizard's 2nd Circle standards.
column3: Meningkatkan damage serangan [Energy Bolt] Wizard's 2nd Circle standards.

column2: Enhanced the damage of [Energy Bolt] to Wizard's 3rd Circle standards.
column3: Meningkatkan damage serangan [Energy Bolt] to Wizard's 3rd Circle standards.

column2: Enhanced the damage of [Earthquake] to Wizard's 3rd Circle standards.
column3: Meningkatkan damage serangan [Earthquake] Wizard's 3rd Circle standards.

column2: Deals additional damage equal to 40% magic attack per attribute level when attacking an enemy under [Sleep] with [Energy Bolt].
column3: Memberikan damage tambahan sebesar 40% dari magic attack per attribute level ketika menyerang musuh dalam keadaan [Sleep] dengan [Energy Bolt].

column2: Enemies affected by [Lethargy] receive 20% additional damage per attribute level with [Strike] attacks.
column3: Musuh yang terkena efek [Lethargy] akan menerima 20% damage tambahan dari Strike-property attacks.

column2: Increases magic damage by 10% per attribute level while [Quick Cast] is active.
column3: Meningkatkan magic damage sebesar 10% per attribute level selama [Quick Cast] aktif.

column2: Increases the Fire property attack of an ally by 5 per attribute level for 5 seconds when they step on [Fire Wall].
column3: Meningkatkan serangan elemen api sebesar 5 per attribute level selama 5 detik ketika ally berjalan di [Fire Wall]

column2: Decreases the Fire property resistance of nearby enemies by 10 per attribute level for 5 seconds when [Enchant Fire] is used.
column3: Menurunkan resist api musuh di sekitar sebesar 10 per attribute level untuk 5 detik selama [Enchant Fire] digunakan.

column2: [Gust] deals damage even to unfrozen enemies. Attacks unfrozen enemies 2 times and attacks frozen enemies 3 times.
column3: [Gust] Memberikan damage meskipun musuh dalam keadaan frozen. Menyerang musuh yang tidak beku sebanyak 2 kali, dan menyerang musuh yang beku sebanyak 3 kali.

column2: Increases the freeze duration of [Subzero Shield] by 0.5 seconds per attribute level.
column3: Menambah durasi freeze [Subzero Shield] sebesar 0.5 detik per attribute level.

column2: Decreases the physical defense of enemies by 10% per attribute level that are pulled by [Gravity Pole].
column3: Mengurangi physical defense sebesar 10% per attribute level pada musuhyang ditarik oleh [Gravity Pole].

column2: Decreases the AoE Defense Ratio of the enemies gathered through [Hangman's Knot] by 1 per attribute level.
column3: Mengurangi AoE Defense Ratio musuh menggunakan [Hangman's Knot] sebesar 1.

column2: Enemies affected by [Swell Body] will have their movement speed decreased by 15% and physical and magic attack increased by 20% per attribute level.
column3: Musuh yang terinfeksi [Swell Body] akan mengalami penurunan movement speed sebesar 15%. Physical dan magic attack meningkat sebesar 20% per attribute level.

column2: Enemies affected by [Shrink Body] will have their movement speed increased by 10% and physical and magic attack decreased by 25% per attribute level.
column3: Musuh yang terinfeksi [Shrink Body] akan mengalami peningkatan movement speed sebesar 10% Physical dan magic attack menurun sebesar 25% per attribute level.

column2: Deals 35 additional damage per attribute level on enemies affected by [Shrink Body] when [Swell Left Arm] is in effect.
column3: Ketika menyerang musuh yang terinfeksi [Swell Body] selama [Left Arm Enhancement] aktif, damage yang diberikan pada musuh bertambah sebesar 35 per attribute level.

column2: Attacking enemies affected by [Swell Body] when [Swell Left Arm] is in effect, causes [Attacked Weakened] to persist in duration. Increases the duration by 8 seconds per attribute level. [Attack Weakened] can be stacked up to 10 times.
column3: Ketika menyerang musuh yang terinfeksi [Swell Body] selama [Left Arm Enhancement] aktif, akan menyebabkan status efek [Attacked Weakened] terus menerus. Durasi meningkat sebesar 8 detik per attribute level dan [Attacked Weakened] stak selama 10 kali.

column2: Increases the damage dealt on an enemy with [Evocation] by 1% per attribute level.
column3: Meningkatkan damage yang diterima musuh menggunakan [Evocation] sebesar 1% per attribute level.

column2: Increases the damage dealt on an enemy with [Desmodus] by 1% per attribute level.
column3: Meningkatkan damage yang diterima musuh menggunakan [Desmodus] sebesar 1% per attribute level.

column2: Enemies affected by [Slow] have their critical resistance decreased by a value equal to 15% of the caster's INT.
column3: Musuh yang terinfeksi [Slow] resist kritikalnya menurun sebsar 15% sama dengan INT (caster).

column2: Enemies provoked after using [Backmasking] will be afflicted with [Confusion] for 6 seconds. If the attribute is Lv2, 8 seconds of [Confusion] will be applied.
column3: Musuh yang diprovok menggunakan [Back Masking] akan jatuh [Confusion] selama 6 detik. 8 detik [Confusion] jika attribute level 2.

column2: For 30 minutes, increases the physical and magic attack of allies that participated in a [Item Awakening] dungeon. Increases attack by 20% per attribute level.
column3: Physical dan Magic attack meningkat selama 30 menit untuk ally yang tergabung dalam [Item Awakening] dungeon. Attack meningkat 20% per attribute level.

column2: 1% chance per attribute level of receiving the effects of [Quick Cast] after using a Rune Caster skill. The effects are based on the caster's skill level of [Quick Cast].
column3: Kesempatan mendapat 1% per attribute level menerima efek [Quick Cast] setelah menggunakan Rune Caster skill. Efek yang diterima tergantung level skill [Quick Cast] Caster.

column2: Decreases the movement speed of enemies by 50% for 7 seconds when using basic attacks while [Rune of Ice] is active at a 5% chance per attribute level.
column3: Mengurangi movement speed sebesar 50% selama 7 detik dengan kesempatan 5% per attribute level ketika melakukan serangan biasa selama [Ice Rune] aktif.

column2: Increases the damage dealt on an enemy with [Rune of Destruction] by 1% per attribute level.
column3: Meningkatkan damage yang diterima musuh menggunakan [Demolition Rune] sebesar 1% per attribute level.

column2: Increases additional HP of party members who have been turned into a giant with [Rune of Giants] equal to the caster's HP by 20% per attribute level.
column3: Jumlah HP meningkat untuk  anggota party yang berubah menjadi giant oleh skill [Giant Rune], sebesar 20% per attribute level berdasarkan jumlah HP Caster.

column2: Increases the damage dealt on an enemy with [Rune of Justice] by 1% per attribute level.
column3: Meningkatkan damage yang diterima musuh menggunakan [Justice Rune] sebesar 1% per attribute level.

column2: Increases critical resistance from [Rune of Protection] equal to 20% of the caster's SPR per attribute level.
column3: Menambah resist kritikal sebesar 20% berdasarkan SPR Caster [Protection Rune].

column2: Increases the chance to afflict [Bleeding] on an enemy when damage is dealt with [Deploy Pavise] by 1%.
column3: Meningkatkan kemungkinan terkena status bleeding pada musuh yang terkena serangan [Deploy Pavise] sebesar 1%.

column2: Increases the physical attack of allies within the range of [Perspective Distortion] by 5% per attribute level.
column3: Meningkatkan physical attack ally yang berada pada jangkauan [Perspective Distortion] sebesar 5% per attribute level.

column2: Increases the damage dealt on an enemy with [Sonic Strike] by 1% per attribute level.
column3: Meningkatkan damage yang diterima musuh menggunakan  [Sonic Strike] sebesar 1% per attribute level.

column2: Increases your accuracy by 5% per attribute level when you attack an enemy with a Gun-type equipment.
column3: Meningkatkan akurasi sebesar 5% per attribute level ketika menggunakan Gun.

column2: Increases the damage dealt on an enemy with [Wild Shot] by 1% per attribute level.
column3: Meningkatkan damage yang diterima musuh menggunakan [Wild Shot] sebesar 1% per attribute level.

column2: Increases your block penetration by 6% per attribute level when attacking with Cannoneer skills.
column3: Meningkatkan block penetration sebesar 6% per attribute level ketika menggunakan Cannoneer skills.

column2: Flying-type monsters hit by [Shootdown] will fall down on the ground for 4 seconds per attribute level. From Lv. 2, the duration decreases by 1.8 seconds per attribute level. (The Flying-type monsters who fall down can receive additional damage by Cannon Shot.)
column3: Monster Flying-type [Shootdown] akan jatuh ke tanah selama 4 detik per attribute level. Dari Lv. 2, durasi berkurang 1.8 detik per attribute level. (Flying-type monsters menerima damage tambahan dari Cannon Shot.)

column2: Increases the attacking range of [Siege Burst] by 25 per attribute level.
column3: Menambah jarak serangan [Siege Burst] sebesar 25 per attribute level.

column2: Increases the chance to instantly kill a small-type enemy with a [Rifle] by 0.25% per attribute level. (This does not apply if the enemy is of a higher level than the character's level.)
column3: Menambah kesempatan instant kill small-type enemy menggunakan [Rifle] sebesar 0.25% per attribute level. (Tidak berlaku bagi musuh dengan level lebih tinggi dari karakter.)

column2: Increases Fire property resistance by 14 per attribute level when [Aukuras] is active.
column3: Resist fire meningkat 14 per attribute level selama [Aukuras] aktif.

column2: Increases your magic amplification by 12 per attribute level when [Zalciai] is active.
column3: Magic amplification meningkat sebesar 12 per attribute level selama [Zalciai] aktif.

column2: Increases your ally's evasion by 2% per attribute level when [Monstrance] is active.
column3: Evasion ally meningkat sebesar 2% per attribute level selama [Monstrance] aktif.

column2: Enemies hit by [Effigy] have a 5% chance per attribute level to become afflicted with [Blind] for 5 seconds.
column3: Memberikan efek [Dark] pada musuh dari skill [Effigy] selama 5 detik dengan kemungkinan 5% per attribute level.

column2: Increases the zombie's physical defense by 8 per attribute level when using [Bwa Kayiman].
column3: physical defense zombie meningkat sebesar 8 per attribute level saat menggunakan [Bwa Kayiman].

column2: Increases the body's evasion by 10% per attribute level when [Out of Body] is active.
column3: Body's evasion meningkat sebesar 10% per attribute level selama [Out of Body] aktif.

column2: Deals damage equal to 20% magic attack per attribute level to enemies hit with [Barrier].
column3: Memberikan damage 20% magic attack per attribute level menggunakan [Barrier].

column2: Increases the character's SP recovery. Increases the SP recovery by 10 per attribute level.
column3: Meningkatkan SP recovery. SP recovery bertambah sebesar 10 per attribute level.

column2: You can change directions while using [Energy Blast]. (You will not be knocked down if this attribute is ON.)
column3: Dapat mengubah arah serangan [Energy Blast]. (tidak akan terdorong jika attribute ON.)

column2: Damage the enemy when they step on the magic circle created by [Healing Factor]. The damage is determined by the value of the character's current HP.
column3: Memberikan damage pada musuh yang masuk lingkaran magic skill [Healing Factor]. Damage yang diterima tergantung jumlah HP karakter.

column2: The range of [Fumigate] becomes a purification area for 10 seconds. Increases the ally's poison resistance by 10% per attribute level.
column3: Jangkauan [Fumigate] menjadi area pemulihan selama 10 detik. Meningkatkan poison resistance ally sebesar 10% per attribute level.

column2: Increases the ally's status ailment resistance within the range of [Nachash] by 1% per attribute level.
column3: Resist status negatif ally meningkat dalam jangkauan [Nachash] sebesar 1% per attribute level.

column2: Inflicts [Petrification] for 3 seconds on enemies affected by [Curse] when attacking with [Merkabah].
column3: Memberi efek [Petrification] selama 3 detik pada musuh yang terinfeksi [Curse] ketika menyerang menggunakan [Merkabah].

column2: Increases the lower limit HP of [Last Rites] by 2% per attribute level.
column3: Menambah limit bawah HP [Last Rites] sebesar 2% per attribute level.

column2: Increases the duration of the deployed capella of [Deploy Cappella] by 3 seconds.
Increases the damage dealt on an enemy with [Magnus Exorcismus] by 1% per attribute level.
column3: Meningkatkan damage yang diterima musuh menggunakan [Magnus Exorcismus] sebesar 1% per attribute level.

column2: Recovers the maximum HP of revived character with [Resurrection] by 10% per attribute level.
column3: Mengembalikan maximum HP karakter yang dihidupkan kembali menggunakan [Resurrection] sebesar 10% per attribute level.

column2: Increases the block penetration on the attack that hits an enemy by 15% per attribute level while [Last Rites] and [Revive] are in effect.
column3: Meningkatkan damage yang diterima musuh menggunakan [Last Rites] dan [Revive] sebesar 15% per attribute level selama [Last Rites] dan [Revive] aktif.

column2: Increases Pierce damage of allies within the range of [Barrier] by 10% per level.
column3: Meningkatkan serangan piercing ally yang berada pada jangkauan skill [Barrier] sebesar 10% per level.

column2: Increases the maximum amount of magic circles [Detonate Traps] can activate from by 1 per skill level.
column3: Menambah jumlah maksimal magic circles [Detonate Traps] sebesar 1 per skill level.

column2: Lv. 1 Blood Bath & Lv. 1 Blood Sucking required
column3: Membutuhkan Lv. 1 Blood Bath & Lv. 1 Blood Sucking

column2: {#DD5500}{ol}[Physical] - [Strike]{/}{/}{nl}Attack with your shield. Damaged enemies will have their stats temporarily scrambled.
column3: {#DD5500}{ol}[Physical] - [Strike]{/}{/}{nl}Serangan dengan perisaimu. Memberikan damage yang akan membuat stat musuh tidak beraturan sementara waktu.

column2: {#DD5500}{ol}[Physical] - [Slash]{/}{/}{nl}Inflict damage and put the enemy into a state of shock by making a big slash with all your might.
column3: {#DD5500}{ol}[Physical] - [Slash]{/}{/}{nl}Memberikan damage dan membuat musuh shock dengan mengayunkan senjata dengan seluruh kekuatanmu.

column2: {#DD5500}{ol}[Physical] - [Slash]{/}{/}{nl}Deals successive attacks to a frontal enemy by swinging your weapon.
column3: {#DD5500}{ol}[Physical] - [Slash]{/}{/}{nl}Memberikan serangan secara beruntun kepada musuh didepan dengan mengayunkan senjatamu.

column2: {#DD5500}{ol}[Physical] - [Slash]{/}{/}{nl}Inflict damage on a frontal enemy through a series of lateral slashes. Deals additional damage to enemies afflicted with [Shock].
column3: {#DD5500}{ol}[Physical] - [Slash]{/}{/}{nl}Memberikan damage kepada musuh didepan melalui serangkaian serangan dari berbagai sisi. Damage tambahan, musuh terkena shock.

column2: {#DD5500}{ol}[Physical] - [Stab]{/}{/}{nl}Attack several enemies within a radius by throwing a spear. Damaged enemies will temporarily become weaker to physical property attacks. The thrown spear must be picked up to use it again.
column3: {#DD5500}{ol}[Physical] - [Stab]{/}{/}{nl}Menyerang beberapa musuh dengan melemparkan tombak dalam radius tertentu. Musuh yang terkena damage akan menjadi lemah terhadap serangan fisik untuk sementara waktu. Tombak yang dilemparkan harus diambil untuk menggunakannya kembali.

column3: Attack Power #{SkillAtkAdd}#{nl}Target: #{CaptionRatio}#{nl}Membutuhkan 2% SP per detik{nl}Durasi Maksimum: 10 detik

column2: Create a Shoggoth with stats based on the cards that are placed in the Necronomicon. The attack and defense of the Shoggoth is affected by your INT and SPR respectively. The Shoggoth's stats increase by 10% for each star on the card. Only Animal, Plant and Mutant-type cards can be placed in the Necronomicon.
column3: Menciptakan Shoggoth dengan stats berdasarkan kartu yang diletakkan di Necronomicon. Attack dan defense dari Shoggoth berdasarkan INT dan SPR dirimu. Stat Shoggoth akan meningkat sebesar 10% dari setiap bintang pada kartu. Hanya jenis kartu Hewan, Tumbuhan dan Mutan yang bisa diletakkan di Necronomicon.

column2: {#993399}{ol}[Magic]{/}{/}Raises a wall of corpses in front of the caster. Enemies near the wall will be afflicted with [Decay]. Enemies affected by [Decay] receive additional damage from Missile attacks.
column3: {#993399}{ol}[Magic]{/}{/}Menciptakan dinding mayat di depan caster. Musuh yang mendekati dinding akan menderita[Decay]. Musuh yang terkena [Decay] menerima damage tambahan dari serangan missile.

column2: {#993399}{ol}[Magic]{/}{/}{nl}Stabs an enemy with a cursed knife carved from a bone. An enemy stabbed by this bone fragment will be afflicted with [Decay]. Enemies affected by Decay receive additional damage from Missile attacks.
column3: {#993399}{ol}[Magic]{/}{/}{nl}Menusuk musuh dengan pisau terkutuk yang terukir pada tulang. Musuh yang tertusuk oleh fragmen tulang ini akan menderita [Decay]. Musuh yang terkena Decay menerima damage tambahan dari serangan missile.

column2: Attack: 400% + #{SkillAtkAdd}#{nl}Attribute Damage: #{CaptionRatio}#%{nl}Consumes 1 Rune Stone{nl}Cast Time: 8 seconds
column3: Attack: 400% + #{SkillAtkAdd}#{nl}Attribute Attack: #{CaptionRatio}#%{nl}Membutuhkan 1 Rune Stone{nl}Waktu Cast: 8 detik

column3: {#993399}{ol}[Magic]{/}{/}Semua tipe Ice Magic yang dikeluarkan oleh kamu dan anggota party kecuali magic area akan lebih kuat dalam jangka waktu tertentu.

column3: {#993399}{ol}[Magic]{/}{/}Menciptakan magic circle sementara waktu yang akan mengubahmu dan temanmu menjadi raksasa. Pemain yang menjadi raksasa dianggap bertipe besar dan akan meningkatkan HP dan defense. Penggunaan skill terbatas.

column3: Memungkinkanmu untuk menyerang sambil bergerak dengan cepat. Meningkatkan kecepatan serangan dan memberikan damage tambahan ketika menggunakan basic attack.

column3: {#DD5500}{ol}[Physical]{/}{/}{nl}Companion-mu menahan target. Mengurangi pertahanan fisik target dan akan meningkat kemungkinan serangan critical kepada target.

column3: Bergerak sambil bergantung pada Hawk. Menghindari damage dari serangan jarak dekat dan kamu dapat memberikan damage kepada musuh dengan basic attack saat bergantung.

column2: {#DD5500}{ol}[Missile]{/}{/}{nl}Fires a cannonball that spreads to target all enemies in front of you.
column3: {#DD5500}{ol}[Missile]{/}{/}{nl}Menembakkan cannonball yang menyebar ke seluruh target musuh di depanmu.

column3: Menempatkan glyph di tanah melambangkan Ogoun Feray, kekuatan dari loa. Meningkatkan STR dan AoE attack rasio dari zombie-mu di dekat glyph tersebut.

column2: Increases the maximum amount of buffs you can have by 1.
column3: Meningkatkan jumlah maksimum buffs yang bisa kamu miliki sebanyak 1.

column2: Increases the character's maximum HP by 5% per attribute level when [Swash Buckling] is active.
column3: Meningkatkan maksimum HP karakter sebesar 5% per attribute level ketika Swash Buckling diaktifkan.

column2: Increases the damage dealt on an enemy with [Langort] by 1% per attribute level.
column3: Meningkatkan damage yang diberikan kepada musuh dengan [Langort] sebesar 1% per attribute level.

column2: Using [Langort] increases the chance to block enemy attacks by 5% per attribute level. After a successful block, the enemy becomes afflicted with [Silence] for 3 seconds.
column3: Menggunakan [Langort] meningkatkan kemungkinan untuk memblokir serangan musuh sebesar 5% per attribute level. Setelah sukses memblok, musuh terkena [Silence] selama 3 detik.

column2: Party members will receive a buff when [Swash Buckling] is used.
column3: Anggota party akan menerima buff ketika [Swash Buckling] digunakan.

column2: [Targe Smash] no longer knocks enemies back. (Only applies if the attribute is set to ON)
column3: [Targe Smash] tidak lagi memukul mundur musuh. (Hanya berlaku bila attribute di set ON)

column2: Decreases the movement speed of monsters affected by [Swell Body] by 15%, while increasing their physical and magic attack by 20% per attribute level. (The effects do not count towards characters.)
column3: Mengurangi kecepatan gerak monster yang dipengaruhi oleh [Swell Body] sebesar 15%, sementara meningkatkan serangan fisik dan magic mereka sebesar 20% per attribute level. (Efek tidak diperhitungkan kepada karakter.)

column2: Increases the movement speed of monsters affected by [Shrink Body] by 10%, while decreasing their physical and magic attack by 25% per attribute level. (The effects do not count towards characters.)
column3: Meningkatkan kecepatan gerak monster yang dipengaruhi oleh [Shrink Body] sebesar 10%, sementara menurunkan serangan fisik dan magic mereka sebesar 25% per attribute level. (Efek tidak diperhitungkan kepada karakter.)

column2: Receive a [Quick Cast] effect with a 1% chance per attribute level after using a Rune Caster skill. The effect is based on the caster's skill level of [Quick Cast]. If [Quick Cast] hasn't been learned, then the duration of the skill is reduced along with receiving Lv1 effects.
column3: Menerima efek [Quick Cast] dengan peluang 1% per attribute level setelah menggunakan skill Rune Caster. Efek ini berdasarkan pada skill level [Quick Cast] dari caster. Jika [Quick Cast] belum dipelajari, maka durasi skill berkurang serta menerima efek Lv1.

column2: Decreases the enemy's movement speed by 70% for 4 seconds on a basic attack with a 5% chance per attribute level while [Rune of Ice] is active.
column3: Mengurangi kecepatan gerak musuh sebesar 70% selama 4 detik pada basic attack dengan kemungkinan 5% per attribute level ketika [Rune of Ice] diaktifkan.

column2: Allies turned into giants by [Rune of Giants] gain additional HP according to [20% of the caster's CON] x [60 per attribute level].
column3: Sekutu berubah menjadi raksasa berdasarkan [Rune dari Giants] mendapatkan HP tambahan menurut [20% dari kastor ON] x [60 per tingkat atribut].

column2: Applies the effects of [Swift Step] to party members.
column3: Memberikan efek dari [Swift Step] kepada anggota party.

column2: Enemies hit by [High Anchoring] have their critical resistance reduced by 3 per attribute level for 5 seconds.
column3: Musuh yang terkena [High Anchoring] critical resistance mereka berkurang 3 per attribute level selama 5 detik.

column2: Enemies hit by [Rapid Fire] have a 50% chance per attribute level of having their critical resistance reduced to 0 for 3 seconds.
column3: Musuh yang terkena [Rapid Fire] memiliki 50% kemungkinan per attribute level mengalami critical resistance berkurang menjadi 0 selama 3 detik.

column2: Deals 10% additional damage per attribute level on Flying-type monsters with [Claymore].
column3: Memberikan 10% tambahan damage per attribute level kepada moster tipe Flying dengan [Claymore].
